reviewText: I was recently out of town and bought a pair of these socks at a gift shop for lounging around my hotel room. By the time I got home I realized how much I loved these comfy socks and wished I had stocked up! I got on Amazon to see if they sold them & low and behold there they were! I ordered several more pairs in several more colors....some for me and some for my two daughters. I will say, I think half the reason I love these socks so much is I do have small feet (I wear a size 6 1/2 shoe) and they fit nice & snug...a lot of socks are too big & loose on me and these fit perfectly! BUT, made with great stretch,  they also fit my daughters who both wear a size 8 shoe. Any foot larger they might be too small?!  They are soft, comfortable, fun colors and wash up nicely in the washer/dryer. I don't care for socks with the rubber grips on the bottom and they don't have those. So, just a note if you need a sock with rubber grips to prevent slipping on hard surface floors.
summary: By the time I got home I realized how much I loved these comfy socks and wished I had stocked up

I ordered a small and I am 104 lbs at 5' tall. I know that the price is good and I expected the product to have a "cheap" feel but I figured I could wear it for a season, but I don't know if it would even hold up in the washer - poor quality and the seller basically lies with the photos so they can sell tons of these replicas.  I also have the 1 piece and I am keeping it.  It seemed to be better quality.

reviewText:
I had purchased one of the designs from this skirt listing about 2 months ago. I LOVED it. The fit was perfect, the fabric was a nice weight to wear for summer, and the price was great. So a few weeks ago I returned to the same listing and purchased two more of the same skirt style and size in two different designs. I was extremely disappointed to find that the quality, sizing, and overall style was not what I received for this order - despite the listing having said it was the same.
1) neither of the most recent skirts were the right size. They BOTH said "XL" on their tags, but they were significantly smaller than the original one i had purchased in the "same size" 2 months earlier.
2) The fabric was much much lower quality. It did not have the same weight or feel of the previous skirt ordered. These were instead made of a rough, swimsuit-like material that you could see straight through.
3) The seams at the waist of both started to unravel within one wear.

I did try to discuss this with the seller but was given the runaround instead. I'm bummed out about this for sure. Not only am I out the $$ for two of these skirts, but I REALLY loved the original one I had purchased. I wish they had actually been the same thing as the listing indicated.
summary: Purchased 2 designs after making a test order previously

reviewText:
I have to start this with first saying, I was incredibly skeptical about ordering this.  Having no reviews to help determine sizing and this being a one size fits all type product, I was nervous. But I wanted something new, sexy, & fun for my 36th bday. With Prime, this arrived right on time, for my bday. Let me start with sizing - is it bad to say that I was surprised how well this fit? I am not a tiny person, but I don't consider myself to be overly large either. I am 5'10 with a large frame (meaning I have wide shoulders and wide hips) I weigh right at 165 and wear a size 10-12 depending on the brand. Now, I did not bother even trying on the thong it came with, I have plenty of perfect fitting black panties so there was no need so my review is entirely based off the babydoll. It fit beautifully, I am a 36 C and the lace top hugged the girls quite nicely, not too loose, not too tight. The whole thing has a good bit of stretch to it though It was still loose enough it hung very flatteringly around my midsection & hips. I would guess if you are a size 0, this is going to be loose on you and if you are plus size it would be to small but for someone with at least a B cup and anywhere in the small - large size range, this should fit you. As far a quality, this exceeded my expectations. The lace on the bust and at the bottom looked flawless, no strings or fuzzies, and the body of it in between is just simply a fine mesh. I ordered the black so no surprises on color their. Needless to say, my husband definitely gave this a stamp of approval.
I did receive this product at a discount for my honest review. I have provided exactly that. Like most women that don't have a perfect body, I wouldn't normally disclose so many personal details but I feel that is vital to get a good understanding on the sizing of this item. I have ordered a lot of lingerie in the past and had pretty much given up due to the onslaught of "Asian sizing" or finding that "one size" meant size 6 or smaller. It is nice to find something that fit really well without having to be model thin. I will almost certainly order this brand again.

This piece is great a petite woman with a modest chest. I'm 5'3 and 112lbs and this fits me perfectly and drives my boyfriend wild! Mind you, if you are not petite, I would recommend going up a size. It's such a pretty, feminine piece that is subtly sexy at the same time. This is such a universally flattering design that accentuates your cleavage and covers any extra curves in the stomach area. While this piece isn't designed to be for full busted women, its actually a great choice if you want a nice classic chemise and don't mind the lack of internal support. While this won't give you the same lift as your favorite underwire bra, the stretch lace creates enough support to make you feel both lifted and comfortable.

Ive had this piece for several days now and found it comfortable enough to sleep in  without falling out the sides or the middle if I roll over at night. The stretch lace panel is also strong enough to hold you in place without your breasts falling through the bottom elastic line, which can be a problem in lesser built pieces. The lace skirt of the chemise is light and comfortable and I just love the black bow below the bust. It draws my boyfriend's attention to my bust and keeps it there. Not only that, it's such a cute and feminine touch. The quality of lace can really vary among brands and this is decent quality for the price. I especially love how breathable the whole thing is. I suspect this will be a staple of my summer sleepwear due to lightness and breathability.

For full disclosure, I received this item at a discounted price or for free in return for my honest and unbiased review after using the product. I am not influenced by the seller to leave a review other than what I honestly believe it should receive. I hope that you have found this review helpful and feel free to ask any questions. I will do my best to answer them.

reviewText: This leather backpack is very nice. It is real leather. The leather is so smooth and shiny. It is a great replacement for a pocketbook. It is not big enough to carry school books unless they are small, but they tell you that in advance. This bag has pockets everywhere. Pockets outside on the sides of the bag and on sections on the inside. The straps are leather but they are sewed onto somekind of rugged material so that you don't have to worry about them snapping. The bag is lined, but it is not the highest quality lining, it is a little crunchy, not as bad as I've ever seen though. I was really surprised about what nice quality the leather was. I was worrried that the bag would be that ground leather if you don't know what i mean, some purse makers take old leather scraps, grind them up and mix it with somekind of glue to make a "recycled" leather product that they use to make purses and they call it genuine leather. This is not that, this is nice quality leather. It will fit all of your needs, your cellphone, wallet, make up, brush or combs, a snack, a soda...lol...you get the point, it is roomy but still a nice medium sized bag/purse. It has two straps like your average backpack. I am hoping I get to keep it but once my mother sees it she will want it and I will feel guilty if i don't give it to her, she is my mom! This is a really nice bag. I received this bag at a discount in exchange for my honest unbiased oppinion. I am a name brand snob and usually only carry designer bags but this is a really nice looking leather so if i get to keep it, i would feel good wearing it.

reviewText: I purchased the pink t-shirt with the equastrian theme, as i am an avid horse back rider and hope that my daughter will someday be intrested as well. I bought size 2T for my 14 month old daughter, and it fits perfect. I don't like her clothes being tight or too loose and hanging off her,  and this is just right, it fits nice with room for comfort. She is tall (32inches) and solid ,(size 6 diapers, 25lbs) , bigger than your average one year old. I recieved this product at a discount and wasn't sure as to what I should expect as far as quality goes, but I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the package! The t-shirt is soft and the stitching is A+. The horse and the equastrian items on the shirt are not printed on, but are actually pieces of fabric stitched on, and raised off the shirt. This gives it a nice look, almost as if it's embroidered on. I really like the way its done, it makes it look very high quality. I honestly wasn't expecting such a beautiful product for the discounted price of $2.99, or even for the listed price of $9.99. But I am very impressed with the quality and workmanship of this t-shirt and think it is well worth it's listed price and then some. I hope my daughters measurements helps someone with sizing! I did recieve this item at a discount , but that fact, in no way changed or influenced my opinion, which is completely my own .
summary: Wow I am impressed! Beautiful design!

These shoes are so cool! The lights on them are very vibrant and the fit on them is surprisingly comfortable. I was thinking these would be more of a shoe that was good for looks only but the style and fit is a bonus. I wore these out to a family lunch and my family thought they were so funny. Everyone wanted to know where I got them and why I chose to get light up shoes! The answer: because I don't always have to be a professional adult, I can still be an adult child! They are so fun, and they are an attention grabber. The shoes are made of a thick cloth material, similar to Nike tennis shoes. I like that they fit true to size as well. Be sure to follow the sizing chart exactly. If your foot is right in the middle of being between two sizes, then I suggest to size up. The sizing from this seller is not what we are used to buying (example size 7, 7.5, 8, so on) just be sure to order your size accordingly. You charge the sneakers with the same cord as you would an Android. The shoes come with a dual charging cord. There is not a way to measure battery life though. Another great thing is that you can change the color of the lights from solid, to flashing, to slow strobe and so on. I got this at a discount in exchange for a review, and passed it on to mom to try out. In the meanwhile, I also took the time to examine the gown on a technical basis. The printed design is sharp and bright, very 60s, the colors are solid without any signs of misprinting, fading, or misaligned colors. The fabric appears to be a woven polyester, has a little give, is lightweight and airy. The stitching and seam work are done very well, made to hold up well, though you may want to go in with a pair of scissors, as there are some bits of thread hanging off at the ends of the seams. Other than that, it's a very attractive gown, both for casual wear, and costuming (say you have a 60s themed party, or want to dress like a hippie).

reviewText: I was stuck between giving this 2 or 3 stars and wish I could have given it a 2.5 stars instead. The 3 star ruling one out because of how well made, detailed, and beautiful the robe is and that really is this sets saving grace. I got this because it's well sexy looking and I wanted to surprise the hubby one night after getting the kiddo to bed. In the pics I know the model is skinny and well I am not but it did show the bra looking like it held the girls up decently and the g-string well it actually covers the models nether region. I also loved how the robe looked and the fact that it was lace put this over the top for me. I got this in the mail and on first inspection it looked like everything was going to be great. I got the xl which is supposed to be for a 14/16 which is what I am though I admit I'm closer to being a 16 though lately I have been able to get into some of my 14's so that means that my start to a healthy lifestyle is starting to pay off whoot whoot. I loved the look of the robe right away and the bra looked sexy but then I got to the g-string. When I first looked at the g-string one of the leg holes was so much bigger than the other that I was very confused by it. I then tried tugging on it a little and I found that the back part of the g-string actually moved so you are able to I guess adjust it to where you need it to be. I'm not sure if its just me but I haven't ever really seen an adjustable pair of underwear before. When I put them on though the fit around the waist was fine it didn't cut into me at all but the triangle piece that covers up my nether bits well didn't really do a great job at all. It was much to small and it made that area down there just look unappealing. I put on the bra top and was equally disappointed. The part that goes over the neck is just a giant loop that isn't adjustable at all. There is however a tie for around the waist and when tied is secure and doesn't aggravate me by being itchy or anything like that. I wish the neck portion of the top was adjustable because as is it just makes my girls look horrible. All the top is, is just two little triangles that go over the nip area of your girls. The triangles are not very wide and offer basically no coverage. On the pics of the model though she has ample coverage. I guess maybe if your small chested you may have better luck with the top. Also the top offers no support what-so-ever so if your like me and have had a kid and the girls sag a bit this does nothing but make them and you look like those horrible cartoons of grandmas with saggy ta ta's trying to wear sexy bra's for their husbands. When I tried to tie a knot in the loop to help pull the girls up all it did was make them look like they were water balloons being compressed and about to burst. It was just unappealing no matter what I did with it. I will say however that the lace pattern that is on the bra is very pretty and would make it very sexy if it was just better made. The robe which I consider to be the main part of this outfit is GORGEOUS I absolutely love it. The lace is amazing it has this nice feel to it and almost has the same quality of rippling silk. I guess I'm trying to say instead of the sometimes rough texture or stark feel that some lace can have this actually feels very nice and is pretty darn awesome. The robe fits perfectly I do not believe it is meant to close even though it comes with a ribbon. In the models picture with hers tied it isn't even really all the way closed. I do want to say the ribbon included is junk though. Its much to short and is basically pointless. The lace design that I love the most on this robe is going down the opening of the robe and on the sleeves. I'm not sure if this is the proper terminology for it but it looks like a scalloped eyelash type design and is just stunning. There were no snags or tears in my robe upon arrival and after wearing it around the house to see if it would snag I didn't have any issues with it. The robe is the best thing about this set. I would love it though if they offered a version of it with full length sleeves instead of 3/4 and as full length. I can see this robe being worn as a cover up for a swim suite or as a cover for say a dress with spaghetti straps or tank top style. So not only is it great for being sexy it can also have practical uses. The hem of this ends in just as straight edge I do wish it would have continued the scalloped edging all the way down but it is still beautiful regardless. I would also like to make note that I felt so uncomfortable and so not sexy in this set that I did not even let my husband see me in it and I threw away everything except for the robe. I did receive the Queen M lace floral lingerie bath robe set at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review and all opinions expressed above are 100% my own and based off of my personal use and experiences while wearing this set.
summary: The robe is GORGEOUS!! everything else is JUNK!!!

reviewText: I actually love the style and design of this jumpsuit. It is a wonderful summer outfit that you will be cool and stylish. This jumpsuit was a first for me. I am a pear shaped woman and for me the problem has always been the reverse, just right at the top and too small at the bottom or just right on the bottom and too large at the top.  With my best foundation garments, the fit was a lot better.  I got this jumpsuit at a discount and I recommend it.  Just remember that this jumpsuit is not designed for every body shape, it is designed to accent the bottom.

reviewText: This is stunning.  It is classy. And a definite eye-catcher.  My job does not let like us posting pictures of ourselves on social media.  I wanted my niece to model this for me but I would never have gotten it back.  My neighbors daughter is home from college, she already knows she cant have mine, but I sent her the Amazon link.  As we walked to the store after our quick shoot, she and she was complimented by men and women.  This is one of those outfits if you have a friend, sister, daughter that borrows your clothes you will never see this again.  Youd better buy two!  It is forgiving with 12% spandex. I probably should have gotten a medium, its a large in the picture and it fits her frame very nicely she had on flats but she could easily wear it with heels.  Oubaybay jumpsuit also feels nice, it is that thicker stretch material you cannot see through, that is not sexy to me, its seems way too desperate to me.  You can wear this so many ways.  There is also an added detail which takes it up another notch an epaulet with crystal button in the back.  Ive photographed it below.  I received this jumpsuit at a discount, this is still my honest review...you can see for yourself.  The craftsmanship is on point, normally companys just cut and sew pieces together.  Oubaybay took the time to match the pattern in the front so it frames, and leads the eye right up to your face. I also have not seen this in local stores so you can rest assured everyone else will not be wearing it.  Get it, wear it and let it do all the flirting for you.

It was a Christmas gift for my daughter. and to be honest I was a little afraid she will be disappointed but to my surprise she love it as much as I did.
Yes I will recommend this product to my friends.
Regards,
Yolanda Arnau

But they do come in a variety of colors are original and look cute once they're in. Disclaimer: I received this product for a discount in exchange for my honest review. This however has not influenced my opinion. As an online shopper I know how important these reviews are in helping someone decide whether or not to buy a product. When I am debating if I should buy a product or not I rely heavily on reviews like these to help me make my decision. I place equal importance on negative and positive reviews. I like to know why you liked or disliked a product. If there are enough negative reviews that say the same thing I know that a product is no good and I don't buy it. I'm not afraid to give a negative review if I'm disappointed with a product if it keeps someone from wasting their money on a bad product. Which is why I strive to keep my reviews honest unbiased and factual.

reviewText: Floerns Women's Long Sleeve Flower Floral is just a beautiful dress! However it's a big in the waistline where it feels like a heavy weight on a shoulders instead of fitted to the body. A size small would have probably been better.

I simply love this dress! When it first arrived, I was a bit upset because the zipper pull was at the neckline but the zipper was undone and there wasn't enough time to return it and get a new before a trip I was planning to take this on. So I gently eased the zipper pull back down to the bottom and praise the Lord it works like a charm now so no return necessary.  Besides that, the dress fits perfectly (I went by the measurements listed), is of a sturdy material, looks just like it does in the  photos, and I got a ton of compliments! of course I folded the sleeves under at my elbows since it was the middle of summer (my sister actually thought it was designed with 3/4 sleeves) and wore it with a belt where the skirt and bodice meet and it was as gorgeous as could be especially with my hot pink wedges. Did I mention that it is fully lined? Completely satisfied and well worth the money.

To me, these glasses were different and I needed to have them. Ever since I've been wearing them, the comments are so much more of a reason that I made the right decision! You get your big glasses that are dramatized to appeal as cat eyes but still nothing too overwhelming and super fun! I got the one with the blue lens which have a reflective mirror on the outside, making it next to impossible to see to my eyes. Though that's not a make it or break deal with me and sunglasses, I do enjoy that. The sun is block wonderfully with these that I'm not having to change to another pair to ensure that I'm keeping the sun out of the way. I was a bit concerned about the nose pieces though. Every time I get a pair of glasses with the nose pieces they end up digging into my nose and I have to take off the glasses. I was so stoked when they just glided onto my nose, that I had to take it off several times to ensure that I was putting them on correctly and that I did see nose pieces on the glasses and wasn't working myself up over nothing! I also don't have issues with the nose pieces getting stuck in my hair when I push them up on top of my head. Maybe that's just a fluke though?! ha. I did receive these at a discounted rate for my unbiased review. My opinion was not influenced by the discount that I received.
summary: The look, style and the feel make these glasses so much better.

reviewText: I'm always in need of nipple coverage. I wear a lot of sports bra and not all of them have padding in the front area, which leaves me exposed. I like being able c to work out or wear a bralett without thinking everyone is staring at my nipples. This gives great coverage and I'm more than overjoyed that it can be used multiple times. Per description on the box SMOOTH COVERAGE. It comes in a perfect round shape to help cover the entire nipple area and is ideal to wear with or without a bra for protection and extra coverage. REUSABLE AND SELF- ADHESIVE. These nippies are made with high-quality silicone gel that is hypoallergenic so skin will less likely get irritated with every use. Maximize its use as you can wear this for up to 50 times. I was fortunate enough to receive this item for free in return for my honest review. which are my own and hAve not been altered by any company.

These silicone nipple pasties are sooo much better than I even expected!! It was such a pleasant surprise really!

Cheaply made yes, but there is nothing specific I would change: probably only the borders of the round silicone pieces... it would be nice if they would be cut slightly better - but in the end it is not even a big deal.

I sometimes don't feel like wearing a bra.. but, as we all know, as a woman, no matter how big or small your breasts are, not wearing a bra has ONE big problem: eventually you will see nipple through the shirt. And I personally HATE that! I just don't find it classy and they way I am, I would just feel totally uncomfortable.
These nipples come in a box, covered with a plastic part. Take it off and they are ready to be put on! I was surprised how well these are sticking and that they just cover everything that needs to be covered. They are soo soft and light-weight (It's a pleasure to wear these pasties!) and will stay in position for hours and hours... I forgot I had them on after the first 10minutes!!!

GREAT PRODUCT!
Once you take them off, just rinse them and let them dry before storing them. And the next time, they are easy to be put on again. LOVELY! They are perfectly under anything you can think of wearing without a bra, thick or thin.. you won't notice anything.

So simple and so smart. I am soo happy I got the chance to try this product! I think that $11.99 is really a good price for this item. I would definitely buy this again the moment is will start not sticking anymore.

Definitely recommended!
summary: LIGHT! You'll forget you are wearing these! They stick absolutely perfectly and won't fall off. LOVE IT!!!

reviewText:
BEWARE! THIS IS NOT THE BRAND FIREAM. IT IS LITTLE MAVEN. Not that the brand matters, your still getting the shirt. But if your buying (like me) numerous Fiream products based on the first purchase I made you will soon find out that Fiream is selling 3 brands of clothing. Fiream, Little Maven and Jumping Meters. Which makes it impossible to buy the right size ever! Fiream runs VERY SMALL, Little Maven runs big and Jumping Meters seems to run big too. The shirt I bought here is the blue shirt with the train. It actually has the ORIGINAL tag cut out and the Fiream tag safety pinned inside.
So, the shirt...cute! quality, unwashed, is average of a typical tee shirt. Decent buy. could get similar item for maybe $7 in a store but I shop online. So just know you won't be certain what brand your getting when you buying ANYTHING by Fiream and therefore you may be returning it.
summary: 3 different brands being sold under one name

reviewText: The wait was worth it! I LOVE this shirt! I bought this adorable shirt for my three in a half year old grandson. He has a little bitty body, but a big boy attitude. I ordered a size 2T.  He usually wears an 18 months to 24 months. However, I wanted him to get plenty of wear out of it. Plus it is 100% cotton. The brand is Jumping Beans. It is made of a super soft, breathable cotton. I bought the shirt with the race car design on it. There is embroidery stitching for the flag, number eight, tires, mirrors and the horizontal lines on the grill. The main body of the race car, wheels, grill, and windshield are appliques. In the past I have bought many shirts for my grandson with embroidery on them; several were custom made. Usually the embroidery backing is stiff and uncomfortable on his skin. He has a feeding tube, so needless to say, this can cause big problems. This shirt does have the embroidery backing, but it is not stiff. I have no idea what kind of material this backing is, but it is soft. The embroidery stitching and applique makes it a little stiff, but not rough. So if you have a child that has any kind of sensory issues, this shirt should not be a problem for them.  I could not be happier about my purchase! And I am extremely picky when buying for my grandson! I purchased this shirt at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review of this product. I bought three different styles of shirts similar to this one from the same seller without them being at a discounted price. It was because I loved the shirts so much, that I initially agreed to write a review and receive this shirt at a discounted price. So I can honestly say, I would pay full price for this shirt.

reviewText:
All I can say is measure and make sure it fits, especially with Asian companies. We do and we are never disappointed. I bought this thin little halter for the summer, and my 22 year old stole it away.
You can wear it with anything. It is light, comfortable, has a closure at the neck (not a tie so it is not bulky, yay!) and the tie back is high enough so nothing hangs out the side, if you know what I mean. I wore it with white pants as shown and my daughter wore it with shorts. Pretty versatile and light, and easy wash and dry material.
I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review. However, I am just like you when it comes to reviews, I depend on them when I shop online. This is why I always give my 100% honest opinion.

This is a really cute and comfortable top! I love the coverage on the front, allowing a sexy back to peek out for summer!  This is the perfect summer top to pair with shorts or jeans. The material is soft with not much give. It ties perfectly in the back in a bow. It was a little shorter in length than I thought it would be.  I would recommend ordering a size larger than normal.

The quality on this Favolook women sexy backless tie shirt is really good! The stitching is very nicely done. The neck is choker style and has a button on one size and an elastic loop on the other. The elastic loop was a little tough for me to get over the button the first couple times but it is getting easier.  The neck does not dig in and it feels nice. The tie in the back has some good length to it, making it pretty cute.

The material on the shirt is quality and feels soft on my skin. It is thick without being a hot material. I do wish I ordered one size bigger. Make sure you follow the size chart as the Chinese sizing is very small for the U.S. The style is really cute and the shirt is really comfortable. It is fun because the shirt would work in many different outfits, like with jeans or with leggings.

I'm in love with the fabric of this top.  It's light and airy but it doesn't feel cheap or like I'm going to rip through it anytime.  The white isn't see-through, which is something that I was somewhat worried about.  The shirt is so so soft and silky.  I have only worn this around the house so far, but I'm sure it's going to be incredibly comfortable to workout in.  I tend to get really overheated when I work out, so having an option this light to work out in, especially on these hot summer days, is going to make it a lot less miserable!

The material makes this top hang very softly and it's a pretty nice cut.  Not anything I would wear clubbing, but definitely comfortable for lounging and wouldn't get in the way with any kind of working out.

One thing that I am slightly worried about is the seams on this.  There aren't any loose seams as of right now, but on the inside of the seams the fabric looks like it could fray after a few washes.  If that happens I will update my review, but as of right now there are no noticeable defects which makes this worth the 5 star review!

reviewText:
This is a very high quality floppy sun hat.  It is beautifully designed and works really well.  I am rating this 4 stars for two reasons.  First of all, it came in a small package and was folded several times.  This caused it to be very creased when I opened it.  After some work, I was able to smooth it out nicely.  Second is that it fit smaller than I expected it to.  It was too small for my head, however, it fit my sister perfectly.

Please note that I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased product review.
summary: Nice quality, fits smaller than expected

reviewText: This is a nice soft colorful sun hat. It has a lot of orange color to it. This hat is a little smaller than i was expecting it to be. The hats fits well but doesn't have much room to it. The hat is on the floppy side. It helps keep the sun off your face and shoulders. The outside rim is lined with a bendable piece of wire. The bendable wire does give the hat some structure. The hat has a tie bow on the front half on the hat. The bow is a dark gray color and do not go the whole way around the hat. I like wearing this out to our pool especially when I'm sitting pool side watching my kids play in the water. It is lightweight and doesn't make me feel hotter. My daughter even wears if she is sitting out for a while. It is comfortable to wear. It is easy to bend the rim or shape it so that it isn't in your line of sight. This is a cute sun hat. I received this product for free for testing and reviewing purposes, and this review is based on my own personal experience using this product.

I was gladly surprised with this hat. The quality is ok, made of fabric, and it looks same as cute as in the picture. I found the ribbon does not look so pretty, so I placed it facing back instead of front. The hat has a wire inside the outer circle, so you can shape it to whichever shape you want. You can also easily bend it and put it in your bag.

The hat is a little small in the top, so if your head is larger than average it might feel very tight. Other than that, I found it very comfortable!

Disclosure: I received this hat at a discount in exchange for a review

This is cute! It looks just like the picture. (There's nothing more annoying than opening the box and discovering that the picture looked much different, right?).  The fit is as I expected for a "one size" hat, which means that it's slightly tight on my giant head.  The hat did arrive quite wrinkled but a few minutes with the iron fixed that.  I was pleased that there's a significant wire at the brim, so that you can adjust it--that's a problem for me with large brimmed hats that are floppy, cause you can't see out from under the brim.  The fabric is quite thick--like Sunbrella fabric--so I think the claim about SPF protection is probably accurate. This will be my new go-to hat for gardening.

Note that I received a free sample of this item so that I could try it out and leave an honest review.  All opinions are my own and I receive no compensation for a positive review. I only leave positive reviews for products I'd recommend to my friends and family.

First let me start by pointing out I got the color Apricot-green. I am unsure if my review will run true to all the colors.

Ok, lets talk about that color first, apricot green? No, in no way is it that at all. Apricot would mean an orange shade of some sort, and nope true to the picture there is none (which is a good thing to me). Green? Well that is a bit of a stretch. The top is more black shifting to dark teals, not green. Again this isn't a problem, and is true to the picture.

Now onto the rest, this top is perfect. I am normally a large, and this fit even looser then I thought it would, which is NOT a bad thing at all. It is very very lightweight meaning those hot summer days won't be a problem. The colors are bold and vibrant as well. I happen to have a perfect teal colored tanktop that goes perfect with this, so it is all perfect.

Then why 4 stars you might ask? I didn't notice when I opened the package several loose strings hanging from the top. I shouldn't have to trim my garments before wearing them. This just shows a poor quality check before being packed up. This in no way stopped the top from working, all the threads were just the extra hanging off, and took but a few moments to fix, but it is something to keep in mind.

Casual elegance.
Fits me well.
Flattering on slim and fuller figured women. (I'm on the fuller side.)
Great price for an elegant looking top.
I would buy this again.

reviewText:
The 7th Element Stainless Steel Cuff Links imprinted with you are My Hero" is an elegant gift for any Father, or person in your life that you consider to be your hero.  I believe the price point to be very cheap for the high quality that you are receiving.  As of this review the price was $17.99 for the set with Free Prime Shipping.  I gave the product 5 stars for design, manufacturing and price.  I especially liked that they were Stainless Steel and would not tarnish.

1) Item comes packaged in a white outer packing box which protects the very nice and professional inner black gift box which has the 7th Element embossed on the top in gold foil.  The box is perfect for gift giving and what I would expect from a box containing high end jewelry.  The inside is lined in off white velvet and the Cuff Links are attached to the lid which can be flipped over and placed on top of the box when you are ready to use them.

2) The Cuff Links are Stainless Steel.  The shape is square with the wording My Hero in script written in white on a black background surrounded by a thin Stainless Steel Border.  The back is plain Stainless Steel

3) It is well constructed and easy to use on the proper type of shirt.  They look very nice when worn with a shirt.

Even though I have not used this product over an extended period of time, I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a set of reasonably priced Cuff Links for a gift or even for themselves.  I think it is definitely a unique design.

I received this unit for Free to provide and unbiased review.  Please feel free to leave me a rating if you found it to be helpful.
summary: Great Price For A High Quality Product With a Unique Design!

reviewText:
These tie clips are really ideal for what I needed. A set of three clips at this width is perfect for anyone who wears ties fairly often and they would also make a great gift. I am able to wear one or more of these tie clips with any tie I own. I can wear these with both skinny and wide ties and they hold just tight enough to keep my tie stable, but not so tight that my tie is damaged. I honestly cannot recommend these enough. Five dollars each for three tie clips is fantastic. With these tie clips, you will be covered for any tie you might have. They even come with a cloth to polish them, which is awesome.
I did receive these clips at a discount in exchange for an honest review, but I would never allow that to skew my opinion. I always strive to provide quality, honest reviews.

These are awesome! Great design as well! The concept of these are very simple and sleek. They don't have any adjustment pins or anything, and it  comes in one piece, so don't worry if anything will break or rip off. What this is is a tight clip, and pretty much when you clip your tie to your shirt, its stays on tight and very nicely .

It comes in a very nice box, a strong plastic, not like cardboard or anything. On top of the box, it says miraculous garden. You then open it up and see three tie clips, a silver, a black, and a gold one. All three look exactly like the picture, with the same color not washed out. All three of these are tied down with its own case inside. And also within the box is a microfiber cloth for the tie clips. Mine came in perfect condition with no scrathes, dents, or missalignment. The clips are very tight and im pretty sure these will never lose the tightness. They will for sure stay on your stuff with ease andwont damage anything. These have so much sleek to them that they need their own cloth to wipe it down for fingerprints! I reccommend this to anyone who wants to come out in style and look at their best in any attire. reviewText: My Women's Leather Diamante With Heart Clutch Handbag Card Holder Purse Wallet finally came in after the long wait. 1st picture: It came in with this shipping/package envelope, not sure what it's called, it's made out of paper which is not necessary for a purse, should have placed in a box! 2nd picture: This is what's inside the package, a purse/wallet covered with cheap plastic. 3rd picture: The purse is secured with a paper! Yes, you read it right! a paper!! Not right for me! Should have included a bubble wrap or something SO THE PURSE WON'T BE DAMAGED. 4th picture: This is what the actual purse looks like. It's glossy, the quality is not that good, it looks good though! Very nice detail. Nice color, black and some sort of metallic gold in the metals, hot pink on the inside. 5th picture: It came with a chain that you could use to make it a sling bag. You just have to hook them up! (See 7th pic) 6th picture: I just noticed this! It seems to be a mark since they just glued it. It just doesnt look good. Yea, let's say that it looks good in the outside and not everyone would see every little detail, but come on! a purse is a purse, and it should look good for the sake of fashion 7th picture: This is where you hook up the chain to make your purse a sling bag. 8th picture: This is what the inside looks like! Pretty big purse. It's pretty spacious. Lots of space for me. 9th picture: I just hate to see what the sides look like. You could see that they cut the leather wrong, and some sort of cardboard can be seen. Not cool for me. And one gem is missing. Not cool!!! Overall, i like the design. It's pretty cute. But I hated some small details. The stain/mark inside, the missing gem, the wrongly cut sides, the cardboard's showing already, ugh! I know that you can improve this. Maybe you should check the item first before shipping it. Well, it's not always about how inexpensive it is, maybe we should always look and care about the quality too! Remember, quality over quantity. I am just not 5 out of 5 satisfied/happy about it! *I did received this at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. reviewText: I recently purchased this wallet as I was in need of a new wallet as I am pretty rough on them and they tend to wear out easily as I over stuff them. This wallet looks super cute online but I did not really care for it once I received it. I tried it out for a few days and the metal on the outside of the wallet keeps getting caught on stuff in my purse. I fear that it will catch on the fabric in my purse and I do not want to ruin it so I am no longer using this wallet. It was also very difficult to zip and got caught on the fabric of the zipper numerous times which was a pain. The wallet itself is made out of a durable leather and it was a plus that it came with a chain so it can be used as a clutch as well. Those were the only good things about the wallet. Overall I was not satisfied with the wallet due to the fact that the outer metal kept getting caught on stuff and the zipper kept catching on the fabric of the zipper. Disclosure: I received this product at a discount or free in exchange for a unbiased honest review.

reviewText: nice and it has a good quality.

I'm picky when it comes to wallets. I need it to have a zipper compartment big enough for my change, a place for my cash to lie flat rather than folded, enough pockets to fit my various cards, and a see through slot for my license (as a smoker, I have to show my ID a good bit.) This wallet has all these features and even more pockets than I needed! The leather is thick, and doesn't feel cheap at all. Since there are so many slots, I can easily slide out a card when needed without a fight. The only thing I don't love about it is the "Yoda's Leather" imprinted on the front. I would prefer it be inside the wallet, or even on the back. It's not a big deal, not even worth loss of a star, I just feel it cheapens the sleek look a little bit. I'm very happy with my purchase, and I intend to use this wallet for a long time!

PGXT Women's Short Frosted Leather Umbrella Clutch Card Holder Purse Wallet in the "Rose Red" option and it is indeed very cute. But what the heck is up with the text on the front of it? I seriously laughed for a good while after I opened the box. Simply because the text makes absolutely no sense in any context. "Waiting for the rain, the life is an umbrella." I'm guessing it was lost in translation. That's why I took one star off. I just don't get it! Aside from the strange saying this wallet is top notch. It has plenty of room for cash, change, and several cards. Some are more convenient to access without opening the whole wallet, this is very nice. I like the color, it isn't red so much as pink, the rose part is spot on. All of the closures function how they're supposed to. I don't see any issues with construction or materials used to make it. This is a very nice wallet, get rid of the nonsense written on it and it would be about perfect. I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

Really cute, well-thought out wallet.  I wish I could give it five stars, but the writing on it doesn't make sense.  Though I think the wonky English is cute, I really don't think it's supposed to read that way in English--rather, we're experiencing translation issues.  The front of the wallet (as you can see in the photos below) has a little umbrella on the right side and the script in the middle reads, "Waiting for the rain, the life is an umbrella".  I'm not sure if the wallet is genuine leather either (I suspect not, though it states that it is in the instructions and in the listing).  The cleaning instructions were also the result of a bizarre translation from Chinese to English.
What I like about it:  It is very cleverly designed. As you can see in the below photos, it has two separate, clear ID pouches and credit/business card slots.  It fits American and foreign currency equally well in the cash area, and the coin pouch is large and has secure snaps.  My only complaint (other than the grammar issue) is that the wallet is a little bulky and difficult to fasten once it's full.  However, I think once it is "broken in" a bit, it will be easier to close.
NOTE:  I received the product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
BOTTOM LINE:  I think it's a really cute, very functional wallet.  If you think that off-English quotes are funny, this is definitely a worthwhile purchase.  It comes in lots of great colors and I found the online picture to be true to the actual color when it arrived, which is always nice.  I think $5-$10 is a more reasonable price since the wallet has its quirks, but $13 is not expensive and it seems to be very sturdily constructed.  I don't think you'll be disappointed if you decide to purchase this wallet.
summary: A great accessory for everyday use!

These stockings are great!  Very nice quality and the lace top has a silicon layer that holds it up with out needing one of those awful garter belts.  Yes, the garter belt is sexy, but save that for a special occasion.  For everyday, this is the way to go!  No bulges from the straps and nothing to cut into your waist, all smooth.  I always order a size or two larger than the chart in thigh highs, because I want them to go high on my leg.  These are no exception.  They fit great with your regular size, but I don't want them to show when I'm at work, so I order them larger, which really only means LONGER.  I do not have large thighs at all, but the queen size fits nice and went all the way up my leg, no chance of showing or rolling down, both scenarios I want to avoid.
I am a huge online shopper and an even bigger bargain hunter! I never ever buy anything outside of some groceries and gas, without first running it through the Amazon check. Meaningcan I get it cheaper (often yes!) and what did my fellow shoppers have to say about this new thing I am going to purchase. Reviews are the key to being an informed and happy consumer! It is only natural that I would in turn want to leave feedback for you! For this product I accepted a discounted price for my promise of an honest review. But I do give it straight and I am a very savvy shopper. I hope you benefit from the time I spent to tell you just what I think about what you m

Honestly, I have been wanting a pair of nude stockings for a great while now, so I ordered a pair in the color beige and loved it!

Previously, wore pantyhose and tights with just about all my skirts and dresses- up until the point in which I ordered a pair of black stockings. Then, I vowed to never go back. I found that stockings were far more comfortable and convenient than pantyhose would ever be, in my opinion, and I loved how most of them had a silicone top to keep them from falling down or from needing a garter.

The one I chose, beige, had that beloved silicone on top, which kept me swooning. I loved the beautiful lacey design on the top, and, if I didn't know better, I would think these were pretty expensive, as they definitely look like it. These stockings also had a bit of a shimmer to them. It wasn't extremely over the top, but if you are looking for a matte pair of beige stockings, these are not the ones.

When purchasing stockings, I always buy one size up, if possible, as runs are and will be the death of me. I'm 5'3" and 112 lbs, and I ordered the "Queen" size. They came up pretty high on my thighs, about 2/3 of the way up. As expected, they were a bit looser on me than usual, but that wasn't an issue, as it was not baggy or wrinkly looking, and it was better than being afraid to move, in fear of getting runs. Also, my getting a larger size prevented the stockings from choking my thighs!

Also, I noticed that the toe area of the stockings was just the slightest bit thicker, most likely to prevent rips from toenails. My toenails aren't long or gnarly or anything, but I did find this helpful.

Overall, I had no issues with these stockings. They stayed up well, had a slight shimmer to them, and were the perfect color. The intricate design was a beautiful touch, and I would recommend going a size up, if possible, unless you are pretty petite.

I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

reviewText: This dress is great quality and comes in good quality packaging too, so there should be no wear and tear from shipping. Shipping was much faster than estimated time as promised. I used a black dress slip underneath and that worked well. What takes me from loving it to liking it however, is there are pleats across the breast area right under the crochet, making my breasts look much larger than they are and not in an attractive way. I couldn't tell the pleats were there in the pictures and there was no mention in the product description. If you've ever worn pleated pants you know what that looks like, so imagine it across the chest. Smaller chested woman would probably get the fit seen on the model but if you are average or above expect it to look a bit different. Otherwise, great product and great seller. I'll be ordering from them again.

reviewText: These pants are very nice and sleek for a classic look. The material is really great quality and comfortable. There is a pocket in the front on each side but no pockets in the back. I purchased these for my Mom, even though, she was iffy on if she'd like them or not because she isn't one for capris & the photos made it seem like they would be. They ended up fitting her like regular pants because she is 5'2, so she loves the pants now. She ranges between a size 10-12 so I ordered her a size Large (12). The waist fits her just fine, a little bigger but that's better than being too tight, but the length differs due to her height I'm guessing, so know that in advance if you're planning on getting these as capris. I held them up to me and they come to right above my ankles, not as far up as capris would be, and I am 5'8" 1/2. She likes that she can wear them to work but that they're also comfortable enough to wear on her days off if she needs to run errands. She's already gotten compliments on them from her friend and her sister. No problems with washing them- they came out just fine. I can definitely recommend these pants but would most likely assume they're going to fit you more like regular pants instead of capris as shown in the photos. Judging from how great the material is, how nice these pants look and how happy she is with them, I'm giving them 5 stars. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: I am 5' 6'' and about 160 lbs I tend to wear size 10 or mediums. These pants were a nice cut and would be fairly comfy if they weren't so tight in the hips. I am going to send them back and buy a size up. I cannot speak to the pants longevity but the pockets were sizable. I also liked the material.

WOW, these are beautiful pants that slim the figure.  I bought these because I was looking for a pair of black pants at the mall and could not find any that fit well. I think the reason these fit so well is they are well designed and well made. They also have some elastic in the waist band that flexes, and the tag on the pants says 96% Polyester, 4% Spandex, which means they have a little stretch (though not quite as much as I would have expected, so you won't want to order too much on the small side--they are not like jeggings). I also like that they will be machine washable and won't wrinkle (I'm assuming this, anyway, and will update this post if there are any surprises). I love how these pants give shape to an ensemble and are so versatile. I will be able to wear them to work or for a night out or just around the house--any occasion, matching nearly any tops I have. I also tried them on with a wide range of shoes and found that for me, at least, I needed some height and elegance with them, so I went with a little strappy heel. I received these pants at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review, and I honestly LOVE them.

SIZING: To give you an idea of size, I am 5'6" and you can see in the photos where the length falls. I purchased size "Medium," and my measurements are 40-30-37.  I think they fit very well. I was "in between sizes," so I didn't know whether to order up or down. If you have the same situation, order for the look you want--if you want a baggier look, I would go larger; if you want a sleek look, I would skew smaller. Overall, I'm thrilled with these pants.

Cons:
- The bust is entirely too large. I'm a size 32D and couldn't fill out this tunic. I'll have to take it in.
- The fabric is heavy. I like rayon, but this feels off. Almost wet. And it clings horribly to my stomach. I'll have to wear a camisole under this to flatten it out, but I shouldn't have to.
- The sleeves are like boa constrictors. I had to stuff the sleeves to stretch them out enough for my arms.
- The cinch is still big. I've tailored it, but it's and annoyance to have to do that.

reviewText:
I tend to buy a lot of skirts and pants only to discover later that I don't have standard tops to pair with them. This shirt is that type of wardrobe staple that yes, is basic, but has some personality. It's mostly cotton, so it was breathable and comfortable in the heat. The fabric has a nice weight to it with a little forgiving stretch. I like the zipper in the back. It gives the shirt a little more pizzazz! The shoulders could have been a little larger--it's not that they were tight, but the cut led to the shoulder area fabric bunching up and looking a little less than sleek.

I found this shirt to be very versatile. When pairing with a patterned maxi skirt I preferred to tuck it in. I also wore it with boyfriend jeans later and it fell right at the waistband with a little bit of crop top action.

Overall, I think it will quickly become a regular top in my closet and I hope that more colors become available soon--like white, or pink!

Full disclosure: I received this shirt at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Versatile & Comfortable Top for Everyday Wear

reviewText: Cute and darling best describes this.  Can be worn casually or formally.

These shell earrings with sterling silver posts are really really pretty.  They look like tiny white roses or camellias and sit beautifully on the ear lobe.  I wore mine for three days when I first received them and was very happy with them. My daughter loved them too and I have considered buying some for her too.
 However we travelled up the coast during the days that I wore them and unfortunately one fell out of my ear and was lost in the woods or our cabin or on the road.  I am so disappointed to have lost it and wonder if it was because it had a round back instead of the typical flat plate back that curls under in two loops on each side.  I have not worn earrings with the rounded conical back before and they seemed to be less secure as they didn't click to let me know they were locked in place.  Has anyone else had this issue?  If it had happened at home I would have been able to find the earring and replace the back with a more secure model.  I have given a five star rating for the earrings because they are so pretty and I loved them for the three days I had a pair.  However I would recommend replacing the backs they come with with a more secure, locking back.
I received a discount for these earrings in return for an honest unbiased review.

These are really beautiful earrings. I love post earrings because I'm not keen on bigger earrings. I love how dainty the little flowers are, and I really like that they pass for Roses. These can totally be dressed up or down. If you are looking for something you can wear with jeans or a dress, these earrings are just the thing!

These are really cute. I have added pictures but honestly the pictures do not do justice to the live in person version. They have good detail. I think they pass as roses too.
These are large enough to look beautiful on a grown up lady, which is why I bought them. However, I was impressed that they are small enough to be for a young girl as well. I would give them to my granddaughter, But I'm not. Having said that, they are not juvenile looking. They are grown up earrings. I'm gave them to my 20 something year old niece. She loves post earrings and these are perfect!
I did not think to put a picture of them on her ears. I will add that next time I see her wearing them.
Please read other reviews I have written. You will see I do not always give a 5 star review. I'm pretty snobby about jewelry too.
For the record I did receive these at a promotional discount to review. Also, I have purchased other jewelry of this brand as well. I believe it is well worth the listed price.
Got a lot of complements

These are the perfect size. When someone wears really big diamond earrings you can tell from across the room that they are completely fake. These are big enough to make a statement but small enough to remain believable. They really are beautiful. You can wear them virtually anywear unless you have a job that prohibits this type of jewelry. These earrings can stand up to everyday wear also. I really enjoy wearing them and I do as much as i can. If you are looking for a pair of stunning earrings that can pass as the real deal then do yourself a favor, you HAVE TO TRY THEM!
summary: Stunning earrings. They look real. Can pass for real.

Returned this as defective to Amazon.  I've worn Skechers for years, and I have always worn a size 10 in every style (casual shoes to boots).

So upon needing to replace my (Skechers) boots, I found this pair.  Great!  I don't even need to try them on, because I know they'll fit.

I receive them in the mail, and... well, I dunno if these are actually in women's sizing, but I couldn't even get my foot IN the boot.  I've never had that happen before.  They were literally several inches shorter than my current boots.  So they got returned.

However, while in my possession, I noticed a few things.  The memory foam cushion looked to be really comfortable, but didn't expand all the way out to the sides of the insole.  Maybe their thought was the foot is rounded and wouldn't come into contact with the corners, but it seemed odd to me.  The outside material and the sole looked to be really nice.  But the one thing that would have made me return these if they did fit - the zipper is actually on the OUTSIDE of the boot.  I've never seen a moto-style boot with an outer zipper, as, well, you don't put on your shoes like that, nor do your legs bend in that direction.  If they're thinking you're going to use the laces instead of the zipper, then you might want to consider new laces, as the ones in here looked like cheap ones that come with $20 dress shoes.

reviewText: Nice jersey!

I normally wear a size X-L, so from the reviews about this shirt being a bit small, I decided to order XX-L. Even that is a tad small. Shame, because I really like it. Other than the fact it has awesome graphics, the quality is really good. I gave it only three stars because of the sizing. I wish they had it in XXX-L.

Edit: Since last posting this review, I have been in contact with the seller. They have been really nice about this whole issue regarding sizing. It's definitely not their fault, it's just boils down to the fact that it is Asian sizing. I had approached them thinking that perhaps my shirt was labeled/marked wrong, but it isn't. They were kind enough to offer a refund, but I decided to keep the jersey as a Tour de France collectable. Also, it is helping to motivate me in losing weight considering how tight it fit. Yep, I have to get rid of that small basketball in my stomach. :-)

A further edit: The seller, Avengers Outdoors, has been so very gracious in dealing with me. Every time I contact them, they respond right away. As much as they couldn't find a shirt that would fit me, they refunded my money and told me to keep the shirt. How nice it would be if all companies treated their customers with the kindness and respect that Avengers Outdoors showed me. Bare in mind again, that the three star rating is only due to the sizing issue, and not the seller. I give full marks to the seller, and look forward to dealing with them again if a product I need in the future is one that they sell.
summary: Awesome, but sizing is way off!!!

reviewText:
First off, I've been buying ACTUAL compression tights for years. I've been faithful to 2XU because of the fit, cut and length. They have been a perfect pair of compression. I bought these because of color scheme and reviews.
And the reviews basically, I'm convinced, have no idea how COMPRESSION works.
These Defender *LEGGINGS* have zero compression factor into them. I ordered a small thinking they would hug my leg muscles. Here is the problem with these.
2XU is a thick, tight material that actually feels more than tight against the muscles, which is how compression works. Compression against the muscles to reduce vibration and improve blood flow for recovery. Defender tights DO NOT DO THIS. They are a super thin, borderline see-through fabric. The stitching is irritating as since it's not actually skin tight, it shifts, and the big middle stitching rubs on your leg. Never had a problem with 2XU's tights doing this.
The other problem I have with these is JHC, what is with the excessive high rise waist? Were these made for a mutant with the worlds longest torso? I had to fold the waist band over itself otherwise the waistband becomes a corset it's so high up. And the length is excessive as well.
I ordered a small. I'm 5'7, 165 with muscular legs. These have ZERO compression qualities, they're too long, the waist band is way too high. I guess you get what you pay for.  Spend money and get 2XU. They've never sent me a bad pair of tights.

reviewText:
Buying clothing on-line can be tricky at times and especially when you need an article for a special event on short notice. I find that everyone's size small is not the same but at most stores or even internet clothing sites, you can at least run error on the side of caution that you can give or take a few inches. I love it when sites list actual measurements because let's face it, you are cutting fabric to a certain dimension to give it a size. Sounds simple!

Not so simple when the measurements do not match the article of clothing. Let me start by saying I range between a size small in some brands and medium in others. My chest is usually what makes me go up on size because I dislike that feeling of sleeves being pulled if a shirt is too tight in the front. In comes Milumia that thankfully lists the measurements in centimeters, but gives the shopper an idea of sizing. Dresses are a safe bet because you don't usually have to worry about waist and hip sizes with certain styles and especially those worn in Summer. I wanted dresses that have a light fabric, so these being 100% rayon allowed the fabric to remain light and breathable.

Now, to the second dress I ordered from Milumia. I ordered size small and it was still too baggy on the bottom but nowhere near as the white one I reviewed first. Extra small was available but at 33.1 inches, this left no room for error as I am about 33 inches around the chest and a C cup. The dress featured is a light soft pink in color (in the picture) with a paler pink where the crochet style lays, giving it a nice contrast. You have a beautiful flutter of fabric that rests just below the shoulder and it gives the dress a very fun and just perfect for Summer look! You also have a pearled-like pink button that allows you to have an open or closed "key-hole" at the chest.

When I received the dress, the dress is not at all as soft "pink" as pictured. At the time I wanted the coffee color but it was not stocked in my size. I went with the pink as the second choice. I notice now Salmon is available and that reflects an even paler color than the pink I received. I can easily say the pink fabric does not reflect in hue to the one pictured and it seems like names of colors are being used freely without really knowing what hue they reflect. Furthermore, that contrast in the picture on Amazon where the lace lays......well, it's not there. The pink on the crotchet is as deep in pink as the rest of the dress. The cut is also a little odd. The torso is not as long as it should be, making this dress almost have a doll like cut. I'm short at 5'3 and the torso just did not set well when I wore it. The waist is high but because it is not fit to your body, you lose any curvature you may have and it just looks like a child's dress even though the skirt part is long enough. Very unusual. I have worn high waist dresses and because the cut in sizing was accurate, the dress rested beautifully.  Again, the sizing does not correspond with the one listed. This dress on the "waist" and top are way too baggy. I mean inches here in sizing being off, not centimeters. You will also note that there is discrepancies in sizing by color choice. Yes, Milumia has different dimensions for sizes that go by the color you choose. I have never seen this before. I can sometimes see where one color of fabric is sewn in one factory and another at a different location and you may have a few discrepancies by centimeters, but you have differences in inches here! So before you order, make sure to look and even then like the size small, pink dress I received; the color is wrong (and it goes beyond computer settings), the contrast in fabrics is not there and the seamstress did not even go by the graph present for the color/size. This dress retails for $19.99 and I could see it as a bargain if the sizing was respected and even the contrast in fabric was like the picture. A dress that is just too big and does not represent the sizing listed just makes it a draw of luck. Will the dress you get be the size stated? Who knows! Due to the color being as it is, I will not be trying to fix this one. I may try to wash it and see if it shrinks but then it could be shorter and not something I desire when the bottom is baggy (not airy).

I received the above product(s) free of charge from Milumia. I am not obligated to provide a positive or favorable review, just my honest opinion. I received no other compensation in exchange for my review. My review is based on my experience with the product and/or brand, which may differ from yours.
summary: Milumia: Summer Dress with a Lace/Crotchet waist in Pink Review

Nice belt !

Kinda surprised by the quality and performance, been wearing this belt daily for about 1 week, with no slip, or releasing issues. The belt really stays put. And when you need to slip out for the expected mess making, no problems either. The nylon does not feel as rigid as other nylon products, but wear and tear is dependent on the user not the product. Where I will deduct 1 star is the elastic retainer. When the excess after buckling the belt is going to either fit in the belt loop (on the pants) the elastic retainer will need to move passed that, which means removing the belt from the pants risks dropping the elastic retainer. If an elastic retainer is provided for the purpose of doing an inspection roll, then it is in the wrong side, because the normal setup for an inspection is the buckle is placed horizontally on a vertically rolled belt, or on the outside for a riggers belt. I'm a normal 34 inch waist, but I got a 44 inch belt, I usually run the excess of 10 inches thru the belt loops, which is easy to manage. I don't claim to be an expert with military belts, but I don't recall using or needing an elastic retainer, but I am very happy with this 1 week under my belt.

reviewText:
My everyday purse was falling apart and I ordered this one. Although it said it would take a month to ship (apparently coming fresh off the boat from Asia), it arrived in a few weeks instead.

Construction: Very well made; it doesn't seem as if it will fall apart like my last purse. The hardware is strong, the zippers are good quality, and the leather is thick. The inside liner is cute; it seems to be some kind of a print. The inside liner is a little crinkly, which is strange but not a dealbreaker by any means. Overall, the construction is top notch.

Style: Love the style; it has three sections with a few extra zippered pockets so you can organize everything and not have it get lost. There are thick short handles as well as a strap, which is what I prefer. Again, the strap is well-made and strong.

Color: My purse is a little lighter than the picture showed for Bordeaux Red, more like a light mauve than a dark mauve. Still pretty coloring and detailing.

Smell: When a leather item comes straight off the production line and goes into shipping, it can sometimes take on a certain smell, but a day or two of airing it out should solve the problem. I put mine out on the porch for a few hours, wiped it down with leather wipes, and sprayed a little febreeze in the liner and the smell is gone. Again, compared to how well-made this purse is and how cute it is, the initial smell from production is not a dealbreaker by any means.

Overall: I paid $30 for my last non-leather purse, which fell apart in a few months. This one seems really well made and leather to boot. Definitely recommend.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.
summary: Well made with great attention to detail

This is a really nice halter top & skirt set that you won't be disappointed with! It looks identical to the listing so you can expect to receive what you see. I also posted several pictures so you can see what it looks like off the model in product listing. I received this set complimentary in order to try on and provide honest consumer feedback and below I'll provide all my thoughts. Also, just to point out, this outfit can be worn in several different ways which I LOVE. As you can see from my photos, I not only demonstrated what it looks like worn together, but I also paired the skirt up with my own top, paired the halter up with some cut off shorts, and I even wore the skirt as dress!

***Sizing/Fit****

For reference, I am 4'10-4'11 ish and about 90ish or so pounds. My bust size is slightly larger at 34D/32DD. My waist size is about 24 to 25 depending on the brand. In US sizes I typically order a size XS or S. Being as though small was the only size offered on here, I went with that option. The halter top fit great, but slightly longer on me than on the model as my torso is shorter. The skirt was good lengthwise, but somewhat baggy in the waist. I was able to take the skirt in a few inches and it's absolutely perfect now! The assymetrical cut and style is adorable and will make short legs look long and long legs look longer. The skirt is a spandex material so has some stretch to it making it good for those without a booty and muscular build, but also good for those with a booty and muscular build. My best suggestion is to stick with your normal size. Most definitely do not size up, unless you are okay with altering the skirt a bit. I can honestly say though, this set is worth doing the altering for because it's THAT cute.

***Material and Comfort Factor****

This outfit gets two thumbs up for comfort factor. The skirt is so soft that I could live in it! The halter is all lace and will look cute tucked in or worn untucked (if your torso is short and it cannot be worn as a halter). You can get away with no bra although there isn't much support in the breast area. Stick on adhesives would work well too if you feel you need the support.

This set can be dressed up or down. It would look great for the daytime with a pair of wedges or sandals. It will also transition well into the evening when paired with stilettos.

Overall, I think this set is a great buy! The quality of the skirt is A++ in my opinion and halter an A. I see myself wearing this set a lot both together and as individual pieces. If you are on the fence, don't be. You won't be disappointed!

reviewText:
I ordered way larger for my size since knowing it came from a different country. I expected it to be a little larger for me but it was in fact just A LITTLE SMALLER. It still fits but it's tight.

The BEST PART of this swimsuit is that the parts just under the armpits, are really tall. There is NO ARM FAT ROLL!

The SECOND BEST PART is the ladies. Bluntly, my boobs look fantastic in this top. This photo makes it look so modost. I know everybody is different but for me, this is a crazy good boob shirt. I fear it may lean to sexy for swimming with the fam. My husband loves it.

The straps are really wide and SUPER COMFORTABLE. They STAY IN PLACE. That's always my biggest pet peeve. These bad boys are not going anywhere.

As for the bottoms, these didn't fit. Im super fat in my lower stomach so there's no chance I would ever wear bottoms like these. I instead opted to a skirt-kini.

The nice part about the top is how it drapes larger at the bottom. It's thick material and it flows nicely for us stomach fatties.

OVERALL: BUY! This is WAY BETTER THEN I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE. I admit, when I see a product comes from outside of the country, I expect the quality to go way down. This is NOT the case here. This is higher quality then the suit I bought at Target and Kohls.

I will definitely seek this seller out again next season. I love the fit, the color, the fabric, EVERYTHING. The seller is really personable and responded to me directly when contacted. That makes me feel even better about buying from them.

* I received this product free of charge or at a discount in exchange for my fair and honest review. Read past reviews for proof of my commitment to honest and fair reviews.

I absolutely love love love this umbrella.  Never had a bubble umbrella before, and I don't know how I went for so long without one.  This umbrella is made to safely break - meaning, the posts pop out and in without breaking when they are strained.  They are made to do that so they don't snap, which is a huge plus for me.  They stay in most of the time, so it's not like they are constantly popping out, but when they do have to pop out due to strain or whatever, they don't break and they go right back into their little slots.  It's good quality - feels solid.  I don't get out in a lot of super wind, but it's worked great for the storms I have been out in.  I have already recommended this umbrella to family and friends.

I was hopeful that these would be able to help keep my skin covered on sunny days without overheating me, and in theory, they do exactly that. However, they do run very small, and even though I sized up as suggested, they are very short in the waist (I'm 5'8") and just look really boxy and unattractive on me. It doesn't look nice and lean like in the photos; in order to get that sort of appearance of length, you need to order much larger...but then it looks too boxy and wide. No matter what size you order, it's very short in the torso.

I haven't ended up wearing these out much at all because of the short length and boxy appearance. It would work nicely for shorter gals, but be sure to size up since it's not stretchy, forgiving fabric. I really love the idea of this over-shirt, but not the execution/cut. It would definitely need a tank top or something underneath since it is very sheer.

Overall, I wouldn't personally buy this again or recommend to my friends that are taller, but it would work just fine for slight, shorter ladies.
summary: Very short, gives boxy appearance especially when sized up (need to size up since it runs small)

This is a very lightweight hoodie that is semi sheer. It is a cute top with a tank or cami underneath but isn't warm. It has a weathered look and has three quarter sleeves and a hood as well as kangaroo pockets. I bought a size Large although the measurements indicate that I am a Medium with room to spare. I am glad I sized up. The large fits perfectly. I am 5'5", 124 lbs. and 3B/C for reference. In these pics, I was wearing an unpadded and unlined lacy day bra under the top. I usually wear more substantial bras sand, when I do, I fill out the hoodie so the Medium would have strained against my chest. The hoodie falls to just below hip length and is very pretty. It is a very summery top that I have already worn with a white cami underneath.

If you are looking for a real hoodie for warmth, this one isn't it. But if you want a light, sheer shirt with a hood and pockets, you may like this one. I do. The color is true to the picture (I got Spearmint.) and it won't shrink because it is partially polyester. The material is soft and the top is comfy. Size up and you'll enjoy this sheer hoodie!

I received a discount (about half off) on the price of this hoodie in exchange for my honest review. I am not affiliated with the seller nor was I compensated for my review. I think it's a nice looking, summer top. Great for over a swim suit or with jeans for a casual day or night.
summary: Semi sheer hoodie is great for summer days and nights. Size up.
