I bought this dress with the express purpose of being able to use it for a Halloween costume and for that it is perfect.
The price ($10) is right given that I wanted to alter the dress for a costume. I was able to take the green ribbon off using a seam spliter and then just hand sew a little bit near the zipper area to close the seam back up. I wanted to remove the flower from the waistband as well, and I did, but there was a hard glue spot from where they attached the flower that I could not get off so I ended up sewing and glueing the flower back on. So again, you could remove the flower but may end up with a tough glue spot underneath like I did. I did slightly alter the flower on the wasteband; the four outside ribbon "petals" used to be longer and I just folded them in on themselves to make them half the length.
I bought a 12-18 month size and it came labeled with a "4" tag on it, just FYI, but I found it fits like an 18 month size would.
The overall construction and fabric on the garment is about what you would expect for $10 so it's closer to costume and play dress-up quality, but this would probably be fine on a little kid for a few hour dress up event given that people are more lenient on kid dress clothes because they will likely stain or rip them anyway and of course they will outgrow them in a matter of months so it doesn't make sense to spend too much. Our dress did have a slight imperfection/damage to it with a snag in the fabric but it wouldn't be noticeable from far away, only because I've been working with it closely did I notice it.
Please therefore note that the pictures I attached are after I made my alterations. The item comes as pictured in the add, I just wanted to show what I did with it.
summary: Does not disappoint for costume and play use

reviewText: I loved this swimsuit, it is a very flattering suit, unfortunately it does not fit my body style.  The quality of the suit is fabulous, the craftsmanship is top notch.  The sizing is pretty on spot on, I ordered an XL, I typically wear a 12 - 14 in swimsuits.  The suit is very, very cute!  This suit is made for short stature ladies, its made for some on with a shorter torso, I am 5'8" and it is way to high cut for my body style.  The cut out design is very pretty and well cut, I really wish this suit would have fit me better.  The cups on this suit were too small for me, I wear a full D  and this suit might would fit a C cup size or maybe a B cup.  The boob top portion of the suit does have a thin cup in between the liner fabric and the swimsuit fabric. The cut in the back of the suit is very flattering.  The swimsuit overall is great, however I would recommend it for petite sized ladies, it would look great on a pear shaped figure.  I would not recommend this suit for real voluptuous ladies or tall ladies, semi voluptuous/curvy women could really rock this suit.  The quality of this suit is very good. reviewText: I looooove the suit but it has an odd fit. I have a short torso and a round butt, so I purchased a large. The large is loose in the chest and fits perfectly on the butt. It is a short suit, so if you are tall, size up. The suit is so cute! I want one that fits so I am considering purchasing another because I love the design so much... I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

For reference I will let you know that I am 5'6" and 130lbs- I got a size medium on the very helpful advice of the seller. I love this swimsuit and I will wear it regardless of the fact that it fit's strange. In some parts, it's too small and some parts it's too big but just a little bit, nothing that makes it unwearable by any means! My boobs don't fill out the top but I can adjust it with the necktie enough to make it fit. It seems it is made for people with short torsos. If I tighten it enough to make the cups fit then it rides up a good bit. I am hoping that once it gets wet it will all fit better, but either way, it's very cute! It's actually adorable and I love it. I like that it is not skin tight through the stomach, as pictured. It looks exactly like it does in the photo. Although the back is very low cut it is still incredibly flattering and looks great. The fabric is great and the cutouts are done well, it doesn't look like it will rip or tear anytime soon.  I got this swimsuit at a discounted price but because of how much I like it I would have paid full price for it.

Here is how I break down my star rating:
5 stars  I love it! It is awesome and I have no complaints whatsoever. I highly recommend everyone to purchase this product! You won't be disappointed!
4 stars  I like it, but it's not perfect. The issues with it though are very insignificant and have not swayed me from thinking it was a good buy. I would purchase again.
3 stars - It was okay. I like it well enough but I would probably not buy it again. That being said I am still happy I purchased it and will continue to use it. (I would also probably still recommend it with the disclaimer that it's decent but not amazing.)
2 stars  Well... this product is not so great. I am sure you could find a better one without much trouble (and probably at a similar price as this one.)
1 star  I don't the product. It does not stand up to my expectations and I wish I had not purchased it and (if applicable) will be returning it. I would not recommend it to anyone and think it was a waste of money.

Disclosure: I received this sample product at a free or discount rate in exchange for an appraisal of the item. I have taken the time to get to know the product before I reviewed it in order to give shoppers a genuine review. I think Amazon reviews can make or break a product and when someone takes the time to read through them they often get an amazing product or save themselves from buying a poorly made product. My review of this product is completely honest and intended to be helpful for you!

reviewText:
I ordered this for my sister because she has a Cancun trip coming up that she just refused to find time to shop for. Lol, and I was so happy and pleased with myself- she loves it!  She is about 5'10", 190 lbs and the XL fit perfectly!  Not too tight, very flattering and hugs (and hides) all the right places.  The "strappy" sides give the suit a really nice sex appeal and the pops of color actually look better in person than the pictures online.  I was nervous about the fit and the quality of the suit, but was definitely pleasantly surprised- this is a legit bathing suit, not "cheapy" material.  Another thing that appealed to me, personally, was how high the back of the swimsuit comes up.  My sister, unlike myself, has a great back, if that makes sense- I mean to say, she does not have any unsightly side rolls or "backfat" so while this is not important for her, for me it is the icing on the cake.  The cup size fits perfectly too.  Overall, I am very happy with this purchase and hope this review helps if you, like I was, are on the fence about ordering it.

I strive to give honest, unbiased reviews because I use reviews to make my own purchases. This item was purchased with my own money at a discount, but I am neither rewarded nor penalized for my rating- meaning I have no favor with the seller! reviewText: wasn't what I expected.

In general, our family lives at least an hour away.  As such, our kids are usually packing something to keep themselves entertained while on the road.  Our youngest had been complaining for a bit her backpack was too big for what she usually brought along.  So, when I was offered to review this backpack, I thought it might be what she was looking for.

The daypack (backpack?) came nicely packaged.  The daypack looks darker in person versus what the pictures in the listing show  I presume it is because of lighting.  The canvas part of the daypack feels like what you would expect canvas to feel like.  I was very surprised at how nice the leather felt; it does not feel cheap.  The zippers feel pretty durable, but she does whish the pull tabs had a bit of texture to them versus being smooth.  The main pocket is one big pocket, and can really hold quite a bit.  The front pocket is smaller, and is perfect for items such as headphones and chargers.  There are two open side pockets which are too small in width to hold most of todays cell phones.  For the most part she uses those pockets for snacks or tissues.

Besides the pull tabs, the only other complaint she has is the strap can be uncomfortable if there is enough weight in the daypack.  Personally, I think this is an indication she is putting too much in it, but what do I know?

In the end, she loves this daypack, and has been using it regularly for the last couple of months.  Based upon how much she likes it, I see no reason not to give it 5-stars.  It still looks really good  even after being used heavily.  Hopefully, it will last for a long time.

I was provided this product to provide an unbiased and thorough review.  As I rely on the reviews others leave on Amazon, I hope to provide complete reviews as well.  Please feel free to ask any questions and I will do my best to answer.
summary: Nice size - very good quality - our daughter loves it.

reviewText:
Let me start off by saying that I'm a small Asian girl (5'2 and 115lbs) and that I have small boobs, but I do have a butt. I think this swimsuit was designed for girls without a butt as I feel like the low cut design of the swimsuit sits lower on my back (because my butt demands more coverage) but with that being said, it is still a very well designed and flattering swimsuit. The v-neck design is very flattering and works well for a small chested girl like me as it shows off some cleavage while providing modesty. The halter neck straps can be tied for a tighter or looser fit as desired.

Note that I don't think this swimsuit would support girls with bigger boobs as there is literally no support - the sides of the swimsuit cut straight down to meet the low cut bottoms and so there are no sides to support or hold bigger boobs in place.

The cut outs are nice but a little scratchy, hopefully after getting into the pool this won't be an issue. I wouldn't actually mind a swimsuit with no cut-outs at all, just a plain design, as I'm worried a snag will rip the cut-outs and render the swimsuit unwearable. So while I'm using this I will just have to be very careful.

I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Very flattering swimsuit for smaller chested women

reviewText:
This shirt is hideous. It looks nothing like the picture and has a seem down the front of the shirt. The empire waist sits at the right place on my body, but it's too wide across my shoulders so the top of the shirt fluffs up like a balloon, but the arms are sewn so that they're sort of twisted over the upper part of my arm. They don't sit straight on my body even when my hands are down, they twist the fabric like it's wrapping sideways around my arm.

Also, in the picture, you see the woman wearing the shirt has the empire waist under  her bust, and then the bottom of the shirt is flowy over her belly and is long over her jeans. This shirt does not have that length, in fact the bottom half of the shirt is shorter than the top part and barely reaches the top of my pants.

Another weird thing about the sleeves is that the little elastic area round the wrist isn't even elastic. It's cinched up, but it's REALLY wide. Like, almost a belled sleeve. It's awful. Also, I ordered a size 8, but the tag doesn't say 8, it says XL. That's fine since sizes may be relatable, but I don't think the sizing information is accurate. This is definitely bigger than a size 8 in the bust (and I did use measurement in the ad to determine the size to buy) and in the bottom of the sleeves, but much smaller than an 8 in length and in the upper sleeves. It just doesn't sit right on the body.

reviewText:
This is a four-pack of shoe liners that are perfect for use in loafers. The set includes one pair each of black, gray, white and beige. The perimeter of the liner has a nice lace trim that peaks out of the shoe and looks pretty. In certain shoes, they have slipped a little when walking but in other shoes, not so much. I would not wear these in shoes that are slightly loose (where your heel comes up) or they will definitely slip. In loafers that fit me properly, these were fine.

The content is 85% cotton and 15% Spandex. The colors included are neutral and a good variety.

They look small but they have nice stretch and wash easily by hand. If you wash them in the machine, make sure to put them in a lingerie bag.

Recommend.

reviewText: This is such a flattering swimsuit! The colors are really pretty. I was afraid the cut of the swimsuit might cause me to look bigger than I am, because sometimes when you get that loose material it bags, but this swimming suit offers a completely flattering look. It's quite modest and covers up my--er--imperfections. I look smaller than I actually am and will happily wear it out in public. It's a really comfortable suit. The inside is made to work like a body-shaper. The straps on the shoulders are large enough that they don't cut into you, and the legs are cut with a bit of shorts to them. I don't really need them, but there is padding on the bust. The suit itself is well-sewn, both the inner suit and the outer cover. I am completely pleased with this swimming suit and can't wait for my cruise so I can show it off. I received this product at a discount or free in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. I rely heavily on reviews when making online purchases, so I make sure to comprehensively examine any product I am given so I can give a thorough review. My comments are always based on my own personal experience with the product, and I am happy to try to answer any questions you may have if I can. I hope this helps.

One of the things that I love about summer is being in the water and just sitting around relaxing be a pool or lake. Being a thicker girl there are times especially if I am somewhere that has a lot of people that I don't feel comfortable being in my bathing suit cause of looky loos and being a little self-conscious about the extra pounds that I carry around with me.

  First thing is first, now I know that I am a bigger girl and that my suits run a little bigger but to be able to get a suit that fit me I had to get a 7X.I usually wear a XL, now I know that this is a different sizing measurement but that already made me sad and made my heart hurt. Once I got over the fact that I had to order such a bigger size everything else was great. One of the things that I have a harder time with when it comes to nothing suits is the mid-section. Bathing suits are made to be worn tight so I am usually wearing a towel or shorts to cover up that larger portion of my body. This suit that wasn't needed, with the mesh like material that is on the suit it covers enough of my mid-section that I feel comfortable enough that I can go without a cover-up. Another problem that I have with bathing suits is that I have a shorter torso so some bathing suits seem a little large when it comes to length, this suit seemed to be almost perfect in that area. The straps of the suit didn't fall off nor did they dig into my shoulders making it uncomfortable (the last thing I want to do is be uncomfortable when I am trying to relax.) Being a bigger chested girl I always worry about how the cups of bathing suits will fit me. The cups fit perfectly and didn't cut the circulation off to the girls all while still supporting them. The cut of this bathing suit is great cause the bottom portion of the bathing suit looks like a pair of boy shorts, this is great for someone like me that wants that bigger portion of her body to be nice and covered.

  I really do enjoy this bathing suit. The way that the bathing suit is built almost can be mistaken for a shorter dress. If you are one that wants to be a little bit more covered up while still having a good time in or by the water, then this would be perfect. The suit does great in the water and dries as quickly as all the other bathing suits that I have tried on. I like that all the important parts are covered up while still letting me enjoy the good times. This would be great for anyone that is a little more conservative at the beach like me.

  Ireceivedthis product for free in exchange for my true and unbiased opinion. The opinions expressed in this review are mine andmine alone. Nobody or nothing has influenced my opinion. I in no way shape or formhave arelationship with thisdealer.

My best friend has five sweet children and her youngest daughter just turned 7 years old two weeks ago. Since my friend is sick and cannot drive, I brought over cake, ice cream, decorations and some special gifts for her daughter.  I have two boys and sweet Danyale is like a daughter to me. I've been babysitting her since she was a baby!

I always tell her "I love you to the moon and back!" so this special pendant and chain set was PERFECT for her!  I was a little concerned that the chain would be too long for a child, but it's just right for her!

I brought her a stuffed animal set and this necklace and told her to just wear it for special occasions, not to play in. She wore it on her birthday and to church twice. She also wore it when I took her and her big sister out to lunch at a "fancy restaurant" in town. I had to post a pic of her sweet face so you can see the love. She's precious!  I'm really happy with the quality of this necklace! It just sparkles!

Pros:
1) The quality is outstanding! Solid .925 Sterling silver (should not tarnish!) Gorgeous white and yellow gold plating.
2) I love the moon and stars design and silver/gold (you can wear it on either side)
3) Clasp is quality made! I prefer a spring-ring style like this.
4) The box chain is 18" long and SO much better than typical chains that come with pendants.
5) The sparkly box is adorable! VERY nice gift quality design. It's a nice touch to have a fancy box for gift giving and for storing the jewelry. Danyale stores her necklace in the box every night.
6) Allergy prevention: I am VERY sensitive and cannot wear cheap quality jewelry. Since it irritates my skin, I wanted something safe for this sweet girl.
7) Comes with a polishing fabric to keep the pendant shiny (and wipe the chain after wearing for cleaning).

Cons:
I cannot think of any suggestions for improvement. This is a beautiful necklace!

I was very happy to receive this beautiful pendant and chain at no cost in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. I'll post pics! :)
summary: Gorgeous silver and gold plated pendant and chain! I love the moon and stars design! Such a special gift :)

Pros:
 -Pretty much looks like the photo.

Bought this many years ago in the womens. Pur hased it now this time in 3XL, it just came this week.  Prefer dark colors for better UV protection if out for a long time).  The chest was about 28.75 inches measured flat across so that is about 57.5 inches circumference all around.  The hem was about 29 inches measured flat across so that is about 58 inches circumference all around.  I don't suggest line drying hanging as over time it will stetch out the fabric.  I didn't wear this in the pool or beach much, but did wear it a lot as a UV shirt.  I compared it to the Coolibar full zip years ago and this seemed a tighter weave. The Coolibar has not stetched out like this UV skinz but I did not wear it nearly as often so its hard to tell which will last longer.  To me, in my opinion only, the feel of this seemed less constricting and was cooler than the Coolibar on hot days.  In a humid area though, so your opinion might differ.
Not sure if Coolibar or UV skinz has changed their material, dirability, weave, etc. though.
summary: Would use it every weekday in the sun and wear it as an open jacket to try and protect against skin cancer

reviewText: Love this wrap. Multi purpose since I wore it during the day and night. Colors are vibrant and can be casual or dressy.

Wore this on a trip to Florida, and it will be a staple in my summer wardrobe.  It was a great beach coverup,with enough drape and coverage that I was very comfortable in it over my bathing suit.  I also used it as a light wrap over sundresses when I'd had enough sun, and it was great for making me feel cooler.  I love the shawl collar that hides a hood, too.  I have other upf treated tops for sun protection, but most are very sporty - this is the first one I'd seen that was also stylish.  It's too much fabric for wearing while swimming, but it's great for all other sun protection needs.  Highly recommend!
summary: It was a great beach coverup

reviewText: they can wear but a bit small.

I got these socks because they looked comfortable. You get a set of five socks in a ziplock bag. They were rolled up well enough so that if you were packing them up they should not take up much room. I got the assorted ones so that I would not be looking at the same boring colors. The assortment one comes with one black, one navy blue, one white, one gray , one white and one beige colored. I bought five of these tops when they were only $1.99 with free shipping. I mean, how could I not? I bought three for myself and two for my sister. According to the size chart, we are both an XL. We are both size 36 around and around 124-125 pounds although I am a few inches taller and she has a slightly bigger bust.

The tops took forever to get here but that's expected. They arrived in good condition but are too big for both of us. I gave one to a friend who is a bit larger than I am and it is too big for her too. According to the size chart, an XL is a US size 8 and fits a 36.2" bust. This top easily could fit a 38-40.

The top is thin but cute,. The sequined part is long enough not to show any skin with the cowl draped. It's a thin top but not badly made. Just big. And no one I know can wear any of them. They are either much too large to fit into them or they are my size or smaller and the tops are too big. Had the size chart been correct, I would have easily given these tops 4 or even 5 stars. But even though I got them on sale or they were having a special or something (The price is higher now,), I can't wear them so...I guess I will donate them to charity. If you are unsure about sizing, size DOWN not up.
summary: Cute tops but they run quite big. Size chart is not right.

I'm updating this review because after about a month and a half of using it mostly for salt water activities, the sheen mirror on the lenses has come off and the glasses are basically useless - you cannot properly see. I contacted the company and expected to hear from them in a couple of days as stated online but never got a reply. I used the glasses primarily for boating and water activities and would wash them after use with soft-soap and cold water - same thing I've always done on all other sunglasses with no problem. I'm attaching a picture of what they look like now for reference. Bottom line, they are cool and look nice initially, but the lenses seem to be of inferior quality and won't last long in a salt water environment. You are likely not to hear back from the company, especially after the return/exchange period expires.
summary: Lenses Only Lasted a Couple Months

reviewText: Absolutely love these sunnies! Bought for my fianc and they're a perfect fit. Love that Tree Tribe is an American company that plants 10 trees for every order! I always seek to support local, ethical and sustainable, and this is all three!! Highly recommend!!

These sunglasses are great, the dark brown frames are classy and go well with everything. They're lightweight, but sturdy, and fit so well that I can barely tell I'm wearing glasses at all after a short while. I have sensitive ears, so that's really important to me since I often have problems with glasses and over-ear headphones. I like that the hinges bend out, so they're easy to put on and I don't have to worry about them bending. The carrying case and pouch are a nice touch, especially since I'm prone to losing sunglasses, so it's nice to have a good looking place to keep them when I'm not wearing them. The lenses themselves are great, keep the sun out of my eyes without darkening my view too much and making it hard to see. Easily the best sunglasses I've owned, and buying them saved 10 trees. How can you go wrong?

The cons I have on my part are that it is thin. The bracelet seems to me very fragile. Another thing I don't like is that the necklace had some rough edges around the part that holds the purple stone. I noticed that after I wore it for a day the roughness went away. Over all I give this bracelet 5 stars because I am extremely satisfied with the bracelet.

The Phoenix Women Naval Anchor Print with the pink bow on the back is so soft and adorable. I love love love it!  I have some really cute shorts that are blue and white vertical stripes that are very thin stripes. They will look really cute with a blue anchor tank top I thought. I found some sailing looking loafer shoes that matched perfectly. The only thing I needed was the tank top to complete the look. I saw this blue anchor tank top and had to have it. I worried that it would be short and croppy and I am long waisted. Usually things are too short for me. I love this top so much it is nice and long and fits me perfectly. I prefer to buy my clothes at boutiques because I like soft classy clothes. I always say that I would rather have one thing I love than 10 things that I kinda like and that I do not really want to wear. Well this is a nice inexpensive top and is so soft and the same high quality material that I get at expensive boutiques. If I got this at a boutique for regular price, it would easily be twenty to twenty five dollars. We are going on a beach vacation this month and the shipping date on this item said it might not be in until next month which I thought was disappointing. When I got it in really early that was just a huge surprise. I get to take it on my trip! yay! Ok now I love this top, there is no doubt about it at all. I do not like the bow in the back very much though. It is floppy and I will likely just take it off if I can with out ruining the shirt. It is not hideous totally but it is a little childish and since I am twenty nine years old, I do not want to keep it on and I think it is uncomfortable when sitting back in a chair. It is almost like there is a lump there pressing in to my back. As much as I do not like the bow, I love the top so much I could not take a star off. It is so comfortable I actually got giddy when I tried it on.

I received this item at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. I have gotten many items to review this way but this one is probably my absolute favorite! I will be looking for more from this seller.

I'm only giving this four stars as I haven't had a chance to swim in it. I bought this suit recently and, as a thick woman, I am quite pleased with the suit!
PROS: the bottoms are slimming and don't give you diaper butt, the top is tight enough to keep the ladies up, but not so tight that you're showing everyone all the rolls that the winter has given you! Its comfortable, the color stayed in the wash and it didn't shrink or anything when wet.
CONS: the top and bottom roll a bit when you move around---but I don't think it'll be a huge issue in the water. And the cups in the top itself are quite comparatively small. I do absolutely spill around the cups, but barely and the top is designed that you don't notice except for the top of your breast. Considering that I got it a size too big, as they do run small, and I'm only a 36DDD, I assumed the cup would fit. But its absolutely made for a D cup. Alas, I have yet to find the PERFECT suit, but if there are only two issues, then I'm sold.
Other than that, great swim suit! Its (mostly) flattering, and makes me feel like I could CONFIDENTLY not wear a t-shirt over it at the beach!
summary: Love! But has a couple quirks...

This is a well-constructed backpack for the price.  Very roomy (can fit 2 massive binders full of legal stuff), laptop pocket, sturdy zippers, etc.  Straps are padded and comfortable even when you're carrying a heavy load.  The back has these narrow pads on it so that only part of the pack rests on your back, which I guess allows your back to breathe.  Pockets are effective.  There is one large pocket and a small pocket on the front, no pockets inside except for the laptop pocket.  Minor quibbles: green is less intense than it looks on screen, it's an army-type dull green.  It's also a little heavier than I would like.  Still, it's a quality product and well worth the money.

reviewText: I initially ordered this swimsuit in the size I thought I'd be according to the size chart, and ended up having to order the next size down (which was still a 4XL, hahaha!).  I'm a curvy gal with healthy hips and thighs, and didn't have a problem with the legs rolling up like other reviewers noted.  I prefer swimdresses, since I have two small kids and don't always have the time to change in/out of my own swimsuit after swimming without someone running away from me.  I can put a towel on my drivers' seat and don't feel underdressed walking into a store or running errands before/after swim time.  This swimdress is both stylish and flattering. I have now worn it a few times and have received many compliments on it.  The stitching doesn't stretch super well, but doesn't seem to be coming undone.  If it lasts through the summer, it's definitely worth the price!

Perfect. Just as described. I have gotten many compliments.
I absolutely love this convenient crossbody case and I get many compliments but the materiel is ripping around the open/close snap hardware.  A magnetic closure would have been more ideal.

This case is fairly slim and I like that aspect! I also LOVE that it has RFID protection. WOW, that's such a bonus. I will say it is not necessarily what I'm looking for BUT it is a good case! I like the fact that the case is slim yet it snaps shut to hold several cards, cash and/or ID. I like that when worn cross-body the phone hangs upside down so when you pick it up it is right-side up! I hope that makes sense! ha! That is handy.
I also like that the straps have very secure hardware. I do not worry about the phone when worn cross-body. The straps are easily detachable for when you don't need them!
Again, it is a good case, if this is what you are wanting!
summary: Solid phone case with laynard and RFID protection!

reviewText: No loose change compartment.

The quality is good, but it doesn't hold a lot of cards inside. It does hold my money and cards well, but just wish it was a little bigger.

Disclosure: I received this product at discounted price for my honest review and I hold no bias in my review.

This is a really nice wallet!

It has a nice sleek design. I love the little buckle on the front. It snaps closed for security.

Upon opening it has a place for your ID and multiple card holders. It has a second flap to hold additional cards. It also has two areas for bills or papers or whatever you want to carry having two separate areas.

The sewn areas seem to be well sewn and no loose threads distracting from the wallet.

It is a nice wallet. It's soft and sleek design even though you can hold a lot of cards and bills.

I would recommend this wallet to anyone who needs a nice updated item. It would be a nice gift for a young lady or adult.

I received this item at a discount for my honest review.

I hope my review has aided in your decision to purchase this wallet. It looks well sewn and not cheap.

This is a nice, maybe leather, ladies wallet. There are 2 sections for dollars, 3 sections for credit card or ID and a section with clear plastic for an ID. There is not a change section. The wallet will only hold paper and plastic money. The snap closure is well done as is the structural & decorative stitching. I just wish there was a zipper change section.  My statements are based on my experience with this product and what I expected for the item and not influenced by the seller or by the discount that I received. I was able to receive this Fineway Womens Short Grid Buckle Leather handbag card holder purse wallet at a discounted price for a fair, unbiased and honest review.
summary: This is a nice, maybe leather

reviewText: My daughter loves these shoes.  They are really neat when they are worn at night or in dark areas.  We don't let her wear them when it is wet out because we don't want them to get dirty or ruined by water.  We also only let her wear them when it is dark out so she doesn't wear them out too soon.  They charge easily (both shoes can charge at the same time with the included charging cord (a USB port is needed for charging)) and the connection at the shoe hides in a velcro pocket on the shoe that isn't too noticeable.  We first charge these overnight to ensure they were fully charged.  My daughter has only worn them for a maximum of three hours and the batteries lasted the whole time.  We do not know how long the batteries will truly last.  I would recommend this product over the more expensive similar shoes.

reviewText: Fit more like a medium than a one size fits all.

I mainly wanted this for a swim suit cover-up. I'm very modest and when I go to the membership pool I wear a cover-up between the shower and pool and back again. I didn't realize that it had an inside liner until I put it on. I have a large bust and it fits me ok but the liner is a little tough to pull down, especially when I'm wet. Plus the arm holes are pretty small. A reviewer mentioned a front a back and at least on the one I got the liner is the same length on both sides so it could be put on either way.

At first I was planning on cutting out the liner so it would be easier to get on and off, but I'm still debating that. After I get out of the pool and shower I put this on and it's now a blouse. I kind of like the look and if I took the liner out I would not wear it as a blouse; it's very see through (hence the liner).

The one is have is called pink, I don't know why because the only pink in it is a flower; it's definitely orange (4 1/2 stars). I do like it as both a cover-up and as a blouse.

{Sample provided for review}

Man I had a hard decision to make about this top- should it be a 3 or a 4?

Well, I went with a 3- but let me tell you, if I was rating it wearing it backwards it would be a 4.  Yes, I realize how weird that sounds- but I got the pink one, and the liner isn't substantial enough to prevent bra show through EXCEPT, if you put it on backwards the floral pattern is on top, and does sufficiently obscure the bra.  IMO, its cuter that way too.  I first put it on backwards by mistake.  I liked it but was thinking, the print isn't going to be the same as you saw on the website (floral on bottom).  That is when I realized I had it on backwards (oops) and flipped it around.  Ok now it's just like online, but I don't like it as much because I have to be way more careful about what I put on under it.

Being polyester, despite its very thin wispy nature, it seems to retain heat.  It's not as cool as a normal tank top, temperature wise.

Honestly, there isn't really a difference in shape front to back that I can tell, and I'll probably just wear it backwards!  I still wouldn't have given it a 5, because the liner isn't nearly as long as it should be in my opinion.  I don't like the early end leaving part see through, I know it's a fashion choice, but I just don't like it.  I think it would look prettier if more consistent throughout the length.  Like most clothes in this price range and especially of this cloth type, I worry about durability.  Hand wash or get a very fine mesh lingerie bag for best results.

Now on size- I think I'm a little smaller than the target market for this shirt (description says Medium to Large, I'm a size 4, 32C) but it fits me OK, it's not way too big but it is a little wide on the torso, a hair wider than the style is designed to be.

Now realistically, I worry for anyone with thick arms that this will be a bad choice.  I have very thin arms and have about an inch and a half or two to spare and there isn't really any give to them.  No stretch, either it'll fit comfortably or it won't at all.  I see another reviewer, size 16 mentioned she liked the fit but in her photos you can see she's not utilizing the arm holes.  I don't know if that was just that she didn't realize they were there or it did not fit comfortably, it's not addressed in her review.

Just a heads up, because I also didn't notice them when I first put it on and there is a secondary area that feels like appropriate arm holes, The higher hole doesn't line up with the liner tank top so its easy to overlook when you put it on.  I was going to complain that the beautiful draping is actually in the way of getting anything done.  If you don't use the arm holes and use this secondary area, the shirt drapes over your hands, making cooking or eating in this shirt near impossible, not to mention you'd have a hell of a time in the restroom!  You want those higher arm holes to work for you unless you intend to stand pretty still all day.  Also, unless you are a sewing guru, it's going to look a little odd to have two stitched holes at about the height of your elbow just hanging out.

I received a sample in exchange for an honest, unbiased review.

The fabric of this Women's Fashion Colors Paneled Three Quarter Knit Tee Top USA (Plus Size) blouse is soft and comfortable. The fabric makes it cool when wearing in the hot sun. I got the white pink floral pattern and it is quite pretty. I really like the floral print and the colors of pink & green. I looks feminine and flows in the breeze, allowing cooler air to come inside the blouse but the flounce does not rise up so high that it exposes. That could be because of the two rows of stitches...one just under the bust line and one that is about belly button high. When I got mine, I ordered a size larger than what I normally wear. Unfortunately for me, it is still a little bit too small for me. The sleeves "just" fit and the 2 rows of stitches make it accentuate my stomach. HOWEVER, my daughter is about 2 sizes smaller than I am and it fits her perfectly. She is going on a cruise in a couple of weeks and loves that her upper arms will be covered and yet she will be able to stay cool on those hot days on the beach. My recommendation is to get this because it is lovely but be sure to order larger than you normally wear. The blouse itself is wonderful.

I was fortunate to receive this product at a discount in exchange for my HONEST and UNBIASED opinion. I ALWAYS pretest every product prior to writing a review. I am free to write whatever I believe to be true, whether negative or positive. Most of my reviews will be on the positive side as I do read other's reviews before I decide I want a product and only get products I really think I want. This is my true story and my honest opinion.

I absolutely love my BB8 loungefly Purse thank you so much

This is the cutest little bag. It gets me a lot of "oh, I love it, where did you get it?" comments everywhere. Although it's not little, per se! It easily fits my large Think Geek Spellfold wallet, sunglasses case, a small notebook, my checkbook, and whatever else I need for a day's outing. Very rarely have I needed to upscale to a larger purse. There's a zipper inside pocket that can hold a good amount and another pocket on the other side for keeping your keys handy.

Some other reviewers have commented about its construction quality. I've owned it for over a month and a half -- so, not the longest time -- but it looks just as it did when I purchased it. No knicks and nothing's come off. I especially love that you can have it as a handles-only or attach the strap and carry it with your shoulder. If you love BB-8 and Star Wars, this purse is worth it.

This purse is WONDERFUL!
First of all, the BB-8 design is adorable. I love that he's printed in different sizes all over the purse, and that the Star Wars logo is on the front (which makes it easy to tell which direction to hold it). The adjustable crossbody strap is great, and removable for convenience. It's also amazing how much you can fit in there, since it's not an overly large purse. I went to a movie with some friends and was able to carry my wallet, cell phone, winter hat, small umbrella, water bottle, and a dozen cookies in it! The quality also seems to be very good as the material it is made of is very thick and durable.
Overall, this is a great purse, plus it just makes me happy to carry it!

I'm a huge Loungefly fan and love Star Wars so I HAD to have this bag. It's so cute and well constructed, but unfortunately the printing on the outside has started to wear off in a few spots around the zipper/handles from use. I love the bag, but I'm just a little disappointed with the quality of the printing. It still looks pretty good after a month, so I don't want to knock the rating too low. Overall I love it! Just not what I'd call an "everyday carry."

Great for when you are on your feet for most of the day, keeps knee pain at bay.

My WodBottom order arrived on time as promised and the product looks exactly like the pictures. The mesh bag is a good idea to keep the sleeves from stinking. I bought the black with the logo on the top, understated but strong looking. I used the sizing chart and was at the top end of the XL range. This is what I ordered and the fit is snug, not too slim where one has to risk tearing the seams to pull them up over the knee but snug enough to give the anticipated support. I have used the sleeves in both metcons (many wallballs, burpees and front lunges) and in heavy lifting sessions (cleans, squats, more squats) and have been impressed with their performance in both. In a full squat under weight I feel the support of the 7mm thickness and in a WOD they don't distract me by falling down. I have used other products that bunch up, pinch and wear out after a few months of heavy use. I need more time with them to see if they stand the test of time but no pinching and no bunching and that is a huge plus.

Full disclosure: I did receive a discount for my review but now that I have them I feel they are worth the full price. I have paid more for other sleeves only to be disappointed in the long run. The customer service from the owners has been great. No pressure, just an earnest desire to hear how the community feels about their product. I recommend WodBottom fully.

I got the size small, should have gotten medium. I"m 5'7 150 LBS 36D. The small fits nicely, but the neckline goes up too high. It's still super long on me. It's on the see through size, so I didn't get any compliments when I went out in it, but it fits beautifully on your body, and very cute design on the back. I still like it.

I love this dress and can't recommend it enough! It's super stretchy and comfortable, and very flattering to my curves. For 8 bucks, it's a great value. Sure, the fabric isn't amazing quality, but it is light and comfortable for hot weather, and looks nice. It's a little see-through, so either wear nude panties (a thong would be best) or none at all, and be aware that you really can't wear a bra with it. Your nipples will definitely show through a bit.  While the material is very thin and clingy, I do find the cut sexy and flattering, especially to my hips/rear, thanks to the ruched back.

If any of the above are a deal-breaker for you, don't buy this dress.

As far as fit, it's stretchy and accommodating of curves. My measurements are 35-23-38, and the small fit perfectly, clinging to my waist and chest (though it would certainly stretch to accommodate a larger waist and slightly larger chest) and easily accommodating my hips. I'm 5'2", and I expected the dress to be too long to wear without heels, but it actually hits right above the ground when I wear flats, so if you're taller than like 5'5" it might be too short
summary: Stretchy, comfy, and flattering to curves!

reviewText:
I had a single knee sleeve that I had brought from another company.  As I got older and figured out that no one gets out of their 20's or their 30's alive I know I needed something to save my knees.  The one I bought was about the same price as the two wod bottom sleeves.  I had bought the other one because it was endorsed by a big name crossfitter and according to him it was the best thing and the best company.  Understanding now that is their job as much as it is and they get paid to say that they say.  Yes, they may love the products but at the end of the day, they get a pay check from that product.  So moving past that on to Wodbottom.  Firs,t as I have reviewed before one of the best fitness supply companies out there.  I have never had a bad experience with this company.  They are professional and personable they are a company that you can trust to be honest and help their customers out.

On to the sleeves, the biggest problem I had with my other sleeve is that it would not stay up and would tend to bunch up.  It would be that in the middle of a wod or lifting I would have to stop and readdress my sleeve.  I am not competitive by nature so that extra few seconds was not that big of a deal, however, it would get annoying.  I have used my Wodbottom many times and found they do not creep down or bunch up like my other ones did.  They fit perfect and give the support needed.  I just finished up training and running a marathon so my knees are not all that happy with me right now.  I had lifted once without my sleeves trying to work through a heavy squat complex and it did not go well.  My knee the rest of the day was on fire.  Yesterday I went through a rough wod with a good number of squat cleans and then did one round of a hero wod with 25 Back Squats at 185 needless to say the rest of the day the one that did not hurt was my knee.  Love this product.  I highly recommend if you have been looking at the celebrity-backed brands try these first.  Two for the price of one, better material and a better fit you can not lose with wodbottom.
summary: One of the best companies and products I have used

reviewText:
I have been a L1 Crossfit Coach for about 6 yearsJust picked up these knee sleeves and I have been really happy so far. I was worried about getting the correct size because I was right on the line between the M and L. I contacted Wod Bottom and they got right back to me with a recommendation to go with the larger size. I used the sleeves for some paused back squats and they were very comfortable, fit well and did not move around.  The support was awesome!!  I also wore them for a WOD that included sprints and squats and they performed well. I don't think that I would normally use them for WODs with much running or rowing due to the tightness but I wanted to see how they would perform.

Overall a very solid pair of 7mm knee sleeves at a fair price.

Wod Bottom also has some great rings!
I love the color!
Absolutely gorgeous
fast service knees sleeves work great made very well
Great support/fit. Used for squat movements only. Offered great compression/support. Knees felt warm entire workout.

Have used these for about a week now and very good for heavy sessions.  Hit a complex of squat cleans and running today and no issues with them sliding down, stayed in place.  For CrossFit, these are an excellent choice compared to other brands.
summary: Finally, knee sleaves that stay in place!!

reviewText: I work-out 5+ times per week doing various workouts including a significant quantity of olympic lifting, squatting, and crossfit.  Since starting these exercise programs, I've bought several Wodbottom products and all of them have been great quality, and the price has been very reasonable!  Others knee sleeves I have used have repeatedly split out at the top after several weeks of use.  The stitching in these knee sleeves appears high quality and has not split at all after frequent use!  These sleeves provide great compression and insulation to provide some stability, and warmth to my knees, in turn reducing pain and discomfort and shortening recovery time!!!!  Highly recommend!

I have had two pairs of rehband knee sleeves.  I just got these and I love them just as much, if not more!  They have more support in the knee area because of the stitching that goes from the front all the way around to the back, which is exactly what I need during wods.  I have had double menisectomies and am always looking for knee supports.  I've tried many wraps too.  These cover a large area above and below the knee, have the extra support that goes around to the back, are thick and tight.  These have it all.  Not to mention the cute design!  I love these and will recommend them to anyone who needs knee support.  Love love love!  Thank you!!!!!!!!!
summary: I just got these and I love them just as much

reviewText: Im pretty picky when it comes to what I use for powerlifting. I choose my wodbottom sleeves over my rehband sleeves every single time! The best support for heavy squats (or any lift) you could ask for and they have great spring and support!

reviewText: I love my teal knee sleeves! Not only are they such a fun color, but they also provide the compression that I was looking for to do heavy squats, cleans, snatches, etc. The thickness is perfect to provide the warmth my knee needs, but not so thick as to be uncomfortable. In my opinion, they are the best on the market!

This is very fashionable for a workout; I love the style of the shirt and the beautiful colors, but this is not useful for a workout that uses a lot of upper body movement. It might work very nicely for a runner, but I wanted a compression shirt for a workout involving weights and varied upper body exercises. It is sufficiently tight around the bust, but flares outward below the waist and is not very long, so every time I raise my arms the shirt goes up too. I constantly have to pull it down, but I don't want to drop the weights and interrupt repetitions to do that, so until I can pull the shirt down, it is very uncomfortable. Very disappointing. I decided to try my husband's neleus compression shirts for men. They are considerably longer and tighter below the waist and have a lot more room in the shoulders than the female cut, as they are designed for the male frame. I have an hourglass shape but I find the male cut much more comfortable because it allows for a lot of varied arm movement and the shirt stays snug at the hips so it does not ride up during my workout. If they made the female cut longer and tighter below the waist I would love it!
summary: Shirt does not stay in place; rides up

reviewText:
Hello fellow Amazon shoppers. I hope you are all having a good day! After having the opportunity to use these shoes for a few weeks, I definitely recommend them. I enjoy them because I kept receiving a lot of compliments regarding the shoes. Any who, below you will find what I liked and what I didn't like about the shoes. However, instead of providing the pros first, I decided to give you the cons. My decision for doing this is because if my cons are your deal breakers, I feel that you should know right away. Instead of reaching the end of my review to make your decision.

THING I DIDNT LIKE:

THINGS I LIKED:

  Build quality

Fits well looks good

I typically wear a size 14/16 and ordered this thinking the top would pair well with some of my skirted bottoms.  The bottoms that came with it fit perfectly but I have to adjust the straps as tight as they'll go and they still fall off.  The bottom of the back does not cling to my back and slides down.  This runs large, so plan accordingly.  It's bright in color and really pretty on!
summary: It's bright in color and really pretty on!

reviewText: My daughter bought these shoes and really loved them and so I thought I would buy a pair also. These are a very lightweight shoe with a very soft upper. the are so soft of material that the come in a very small box with the upper collapsed together. Not that this is a bad thing, you just need to be aware of it. They are a really cute grey and white with a white sole and are super comfortable to wear. These are similar to the Kanye West Nikes that are so popular right now but much cheaper. I like the soft upper as it feels good on my foot. It is make solely of fabric. I doesn't really have a tongue as the material is all one piece and kind of gathers under the laces. The laces are a good cord and easy to tie. They don't slide undone like lots of laces can, and stay tied. I like the black piece at the inner arch of your foot. It looks classy and adds a lot to the design of the shoe. I heard that these run really small. I wear a size 7 and ordered a size 8 and they fit good, so be sure to order up a size. These don't have much arch support on me.  The very best thing about this shoe, and the reason I ordered it is because of the comfort and they do deliver! These just feel good on and I can wear them for long lengths of time without being uncomfortable.

This is one of those rare magical tops that not only fit perfectly, but also shrank my waistline and flattered my hips. I felt amazing in it. :) The size chart was spot-on (at least for a 5'6, 145 pound woman, a size 14 was perfect) and the fabric has a silky feel to it. The fabric is far superior to the cheap thin fabric you find a lot online that can't last 2 washes before looking beat up; I expect this to look great for a while. (Though I will use a delicate cycle in the laundry or maybe hand-wash.) It does ride a bit low on the chest if you're looking for something sexy. I might have to buy it in another color.

Holy crap, this is a low-cut blouse. I definitely need to wear one of my "plunge" bras with this one. However, the material is very comfortable. The under-shirt is stretchy and the chiffon emphasizes the size of my breasts and hides/minimizes my waist plumpness. It's definitely not for meeting the in-laws or wearing to the office, but for going out, it's nice.

Edit: I'm changing this from 4 stars to 1 star. I've not worn it a lot so I haven't washed it much and it's been hanging up in my closet. It's slowly been getting stretched lower and lower. The most recent wash (maybe the 5th wash?) has it nearly down to my belly button. The under-shirt material has become completely stretched out and the gathered chiffon just stretched out with it. I still really like the cut, so I'm considering sewing it tighter, but it clearly would need some kind of stabilizer. I've also found that it doesn't look good with a camisole underneath.
summary: Nice, but very low-cut and doesn't last long

reviewText: Very comfy, very cute.

First off -- I paid full price for this product -- although it was only $9.99 with free shipping, so pretty low risk.  This is a very pretty, flattering top that is very light and breezy and hides a multitude of sins -- tummy and upper arms are safely hidden in the chiffon overlay.  But the top is really, really small.  I'm normally an XL -- I ordered an 18, which fits more like a standard M/L.  I'm reordering in a 22W, which is the only larger size.  Basically, this is a stretch tank top with a chiffon overlay.  The tank top is very stretchy -- the 18 I ordered would probably work for a size small through a size XL  without too much trouble -- so I wouldn't worry too much about getting the perfect fit and just size up a couple sizes.  It is fairly low cut, as pictured, with plenty of space to show off a sparkly necklace.  It is equally low cut in the back, with a deep V.  Overall this is a very pretty and flattering special occasion top -- and it certainly won't break the bank -- which is nice if you'll be wearing it only once or twice.  Just size up.

reviewText:
The 4X fits a US size 26/28.  Being full-busted (DD), the drawstring comes RIGHT under the bust and can make the back seam sit in an awkward place if you're not careful, but a smaller bust or a little attention to how the dress is laying is all that's needed to correct that. At 5'7" with a large bust this dress is the perfect length - hits the top of your if you're standing straight.  Arm holes are roomy but not too roomy-  bra is not visible under arms or on shoulders. No cleavage is visible, either (which could be a pro or a con - your call).

Does it have pockets?  Yes.  But the pocket begins immediately under the drawstring under the bust. They are genuinely useless..  They make me think about my grandma shoving kleenex up her sleeve to hold; these pockets would be good for holding kleenex.  But that's about it. The fabric is too light and the seams not reinforced enough for the pockets to hold any weight, and they're too high for you to rest your hands like you could with, say, a pair of jeans.

Fabric is soft and lightweight.  It is see-through, but the dress is so dark no one will ever know.  Paisley pattern is interesting and the colors are fun but not 'young' (red, white, brown, olive, teal).

I was looking for the perfect dress for a friend's beach wedding, when I ran across this dress and just loved it. The big, flowy skirt and contrasting colors were so impressive. I read all the reviews (really great ones) and took a chance on it. I normally wear an XL (16) in top/dress, so I ordered a size up just in case. I was looking forward to wearing so much, so imagine my dismay when I received it and tried it on: the material was nice, but the top was so short and tight, and the pockets were up at my ribs! It fit like a baby doll dress with an empire waist, not at all like in the picture...and the pockets, the pockets were so crazy high up!  I was and am still SO bummed! Of course, I returned the dress for a full refund and had to make a mad dash for the nearest Ross to find another dress at the last minute :(

This is hands down my new favorite summer dress. It fits well. Wears well. The upkeep is fantastic. Wash, dry and no ironing needed. I  dress it up with a little short sleeve bolero, jewelry, and dressy shoes. I  dress down with just some flip-flops. Extremely versatile. This can take you from the beach to a nice evening out.
Love this dress!  Wore to 3 weddings this last summer!!

reviewText:
I purchased this bag to use as a purse, and it's the best purse ever. I was wary about buying a purse online; for me, that's the kind of thing I feel I need to see in person. But this bag ended up being perfect! Lots of room for larger items and a long strap for carrying as a cross-body. It holds its shape well - it is not some big shapeless mess that makes it difficult to find loose items, yet it is not too rigid. The material is comfortable against the body and is holding up well. The charcoal color, in my opinion, is true to picture.

Some information you may not be able to tell from the picture:

1. The outer left pocket (facing the photo) is not really a pocket; YES, it is a zipper pocket (you can see how the zipper moves along the top of the pocket), and the flap on it velcros closed, but the flap is for decoration only. The flap does not hide a pocket.
2. The outer right facing pocket next to it, with the metal ring and black canvas detail, is an actual pocket that closes via velcro. This velcro is not great on this pocket, but I have been able to keep my phone there with no problems.

This purse would be excellent for moms who don't carry a diaper bag but still need to carry some items every day; for students who carry tablets around campus; for anyone looking for a smaller messenger bag; for anyone looking for a purse that has the messenger bag feel and can haul a good number of items.

reviewText:
So this is my review of the Myobe Women's Sexy Bath Suits Black White Striped Two Piece Tankini Swimsuit.  Thought I would try out this suit.  I liked the way it looked like you have a 2 peice on, but the top looks like you have a tank over your suit.  Got the suit and tried it on. I got a US size 16.  The top fit fine , except that the straps are too long even if you adjust them for me.  So in order for me to wear this I would have to re-sew the straps tighter.  The bottom is definitely a bikini bottom and is more suited for a slimmer body.  I would have preferred to have  better coverage on the bottom.  It is made out of what feels like a good quality swimsuit material.  The Suit itself is black, with a black and white stripe look 2 pc underneath.  I love the look of this suit.  I am going to keep it and re-sew the top straps to fit me and I will change out the bottoms for a fuller bottom in black that I already have.  A couple of changes in the making of this suit and a fuller sized women would just love it,  but I am sure a slimmer women would look fantastic in it.

reviewText:
Shopping for a swim suit online is a tricky business.  You cannot try it on, so you don't know how it will fit!  This can be quite a problem.  I generally stay away for this very reason.  But I am glad I did not in this case.

This Tankini swim suit is very cute.  The design is great!  It is modest, without being frumpy.  I am generally a women's size 12-14, and the size XL is the right fit for me.  The ties on the bottoms make it a little adjustable too.  The top is a little different, I have a larger bust (DDD) but found that the girls were covered by the striped almost sports bra like top inside.  There are pads in the top also to prevent too much show through (you know what I mean).  My biggest complaint about this suit is that the straps are WAAAAAY too long.  And are not adjustable small enough.  It is an easy enough fix if you can use a needle and thread, but it is a little irritating to need to alter a suit to wear it.

Overall this is a cute suit, and I am looking forward to wearing it next time I have a need.

This is slightly different from the Tokee shoes that I had purchased for myself. My son when he saw my shoes, wanted one of his own especially since he has this fascination with lights. Children are a lot harder to shop for shoes because they change their sizes fast. I used their sizing and decided to give some allowance for my sons feet. I would have to say from their sizes that they are true to size. My son who is three took to it and learned to use it fast. It is made of leather and the soles are made of rubber. To charge it and to turn on the lights and change it's colors are on the inside instead of the side of the shoes just like the other one that I have. This only have 7different colors as well and it has a rapid blink, and a slow one and the one where it changes to all colors if you haven't picked a color to use. The sides are padded and it is comfortable to use. In my opinion, they are much better than the branded ones because the lighted ones that I have seen only lights up when you walk or take a step, this one is you control it, if you want to have the lights or not, a color of your choice or whether you want a steady or a blinking light. My son adores it, and I do like that it is rechargeable. It took around 2 hours to charge the shoes initially. You will see a red blinking when it is charging and a steady green when it is charged. Because he only uses it a couple of hours, I get to charge it every few days. It came with a cable where it has two micro USB port where you can either put in your computer or put it into an adapter or if you have multiple adaptors, you can use those too. *Disclaimer : I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review. This does not alter my opinion in anyways.
summary: Much Better Than The Branded Ones

Tokee Unisex LED Light Up Flat Shoes illuminate brightly and exactly as advertised! The LEDs surround the bottom of the entire shoe and can change color, as well as, two flash modes with a button attached to the micro USB port. These do come with a micro USB for charging. Charging time, if the shoes are completely dead, is about 3 hours and LEDs can be used for about 7-8 hours. These shoes are not flexible and do not have arch support. These are flat shoes, like any of the skateboard brand shoes, but not as light-weight. These are not heavy shoes and my son who is 7 hasn't had issues walking in them. I was surprised that the soft fabric goes throughout the inside when many shoes stop the fabric lining after the shoe's tongue ends. My son generally wears them from morning until mid-afternoon. He hasn't complained of any pressure or sore areas on his feet. I've looked his feet over without seeing any irritation. The micro USB port for charging is covered with material and is right above my son's ankle. He says he doesn't notice the port at all, but because of the port's location he often presses the button and changes the color. Personally, I like the mismatched color look. This being said, if you are on the last flashing mode and bump the button then the shoe will turn off. You press the button once more to turn on the LEDs and can start cycling through colors and flash modes. Overall, these shoes perform exactly as advertised! My son has been using the shoes steadily for almost three weeks and that is including on rainy days without issue. Thanks for watching! Given sample to test thoroughly and return my personal honest opinion. I create videos to demonstrate that I have tested the product and have made no false statements.
summary: Very bright! Visible in sunlight! 7 year old has no signs of foot irriation after wearing three weeks, but no arch support.

I bought this to try out a vegan version to Hobo but I was disappointed. Although it makes a decent clutch it not so great as a daily wallet. First of all each side it is only a pouch. In the real Hobo one side has an internal zipper for coins and on the other side it has additional card slots. But the biggest disappointment in that its very flimsy and doesn't have a whole lot of structure, so when you try to open it in a hurry  it doesn't open easily like many other reviews have mentioned. I suppose with the Hobo being real leather its more structured and has a lot more options than this product. Wasn't too crazy about this light grey color I got, more of an off white. Will have to return. Btw, you can buy the real Hobo at a Nordstrom's Rack near you for $59.00, and it will last you a lifetime. Believe me, I have several form like ten years ago. This purchase made me go back in my closet and grab an old vintage looking one, and this morning when I was going to my local coffee place someone asked right away if it was a Hobo from the dark ages. I had to laugh, because yeah its a real one that's still in great shape and still gets attention. Its worth the money.
summary: As a clutch, ok. Wallet, no.

I now have 6 of these cardigans in different colors!  I am breastfeeding and pair these with a nursing tank almost everyday. This review is for the 2 Pack Free to Live Women's Open Front Cardigans Great for Maternity and Nursing in size medium black and charcoal.
I absolutely love these! I'm 5'7" and about 140 lbs and I ordered the medium size. These fit perfect, they are a good length in the back and a little long in the front but still look good. They are not to wide so it closes nice when wrapping it around but doesn't have to much extra fabric when left open. I am not pregnant or nursing and these work for me. I also want to add that I wear these with dresses, shorts, and pants. You can dress up an outfit or dress it down with these and since I got the black and charcoal I can pretty much wear them with anything. The fabric is very thin but is really soft, light weight, stretchy, and super comfortable. It also seems to be well made and durable for how thin it is. The thiness is not a problem for me as I was looking for something light weight because its summer right now, These probably would not work for colder weather.
All in all this is an excellent product at an excellent price. It feels much more expensive then what it is and seems of great quality. I would definitely have to pay more in a department store.
* I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. This however, did not affect my opinion or review of the product in anyway. I depend on reviews for everything that i purchase so i try and be as honest and helpful as possible in my reviews in the hopes others do the same. All views are my own and I thoroughly use the product before writing a review.

This set of cardigans has quickly become a daily staple in my professional wardrobe. As many office workers know, even in the heat of summer office buildings are often kept uncomfortably cold. I've tried many different solutions for this. Sweaters I find to be mostly too hot. Some other cardigans have tiny, tight, constricting arms. Some are so thin that they are useless. Some are so tight around the armpits that sweating there is encouraged while the rest of the body is still cold. These, however, have none of those problems. They are basically perfect. I wear one or the other of these cardigans every day.
They did have quite a few loose, leftover threads hanging from the hems which seemed a little sloppy (see pics) but those threads can be easily snipped. I ordered a large since I'm pregnant and wanted to make sure they were amply sized and I am glad I did.

Pros:
- Good weight fabric; not too heavy or light
- Comfortable, not ridiculously tight little sleeves
- Flattering as well as functional

Cons:
- Came with some easily-trimmed loose threads

In conclusion, this is a good set of cardigans. Can't go wrong with them, I think. I received them at reduced cost for reviewing purposes and they have quickly become daily favorites, keeping me comfortable at work. I can't wait to use them for breastfeeding as well. They are ample enough to cover up with in front without looking huge!
summary: Comfortable and nice with many outfits!

reviewText:
These heel protectors are terrible. I bought them to protect my $275.00 ivory wedding heels from the dirt and mud during wedding photos, as we wanted some beautiful pictures taken in a nature-type setting.

Heel protectors were the last of my worries after ALL the planning and stress that I put into my wedding, so I though buying these supposedly one-size-fits-all plastic protectors would be a breezy no-brainer. Even though, for hunks of cheap plastic, these are grossly overpriced.

Apparently I should have done more research, because just as soon as I slipped these on over my heels and began to walk through the grass, they slipped right back off and are now forever lost in the meadow where my pictures took place. Lol.

Now my almost $300.00, delicate, beautiful wedding shoes are probably forever dirt-stained.  And I have thrown away whatever money was wasted on these. I would have been better off wrapping my heels in foil or something.

In hindsight I would have skipped right over these dumb things and saved myself some cash and clutch space. These suck.

reviewText: Love this purse. All compartments zip close, and there are several separate compartments to help keep things organized. Not sure I could get a water bottle in one of the side pockets. I'm picky about purses, and I'm rough on them. Can't stand pockets that don't zip as I "grab and go" in a rush with 3 kids and don't have time to pick up the contents of my purse that I accidentally dumped because the pockets don't zip. I find this purse to be very functional and I love the price!

The bag smelled like gasoline as others have mentioned but that is not why I returned it (I figured I could either air it out or wash it to remove/reduce the smell).  The side pockets do NOT hold a water bottle ... not even a small water bottle which is why I had to return it.  The reason I gave it 2 stars as opposed to 1 is that there are a good number of usable pockets but if you want the side pockets to hold a water bottle, this will not work for you.
I needed a lightweight waterproof handbag to carry my phone, camera, and essentials for hiking as I hate backpacks.  I liked this bag so much that I use it instead of my regular handbag.

reviewText: Lots of room and pockets for everything!!!

I love almost everything about this purse. It was a little bigger than I anticipated when I ordered it (I don't carry much with me, usually), but then I found need to carry a bit more for a season, and it's just perfect for that. There are a lot of compartments, so it is easy to organize my things and know right where to find what I am looking for. All of the zippers go the opposite direction from every other purse I have ever owned, so that is taking some getting-used-to, but I should.

My one complain about this purse is that the material doesn't seem to be of very good quality. I've had it about a month and already, reams of the fabric are tearing off where the hems are. The ends of the zippers are starting to fray. I'm not sure how long this purse will last, which is disappointing because it is such an excellent design.

UPDATE: I've now been carrying this bag for a couple of months, and the canvas is starting to turn blue instead of brown. I haven't spilled anything on it; it's just turning by exposure, I guess. Very disappointing. Still love the shape and style of the bag, but wish the materials were better quality.

UPDATE #2: I've now been carrying this bag for about 4 months, and the stitching on the inside pocket came completely undone, which means that small items fell between the pocket and the outer canvas of the bag, lost in that abyss, and the zipper pulled right off the end of its tracks. Stitching is starting to come off in other places, as well, namely around zippers and other "high traffic" areas on this purse. Save your money and invest in something quality, as cute as this purse is.

Its hard to know just how to rate and review this watch.  It doesnt seem to be appropriate to compare it to watches costing much more, but comparing it only to inexpensive watches it needs to be clear thats what the rating is based on.  Compared to expensive watches it would not rate 4 or 5 stars, but compared with only inexpensive watches its probably superior.  Im splitting the difference and giving it a well-deserved 4 stars.

Judged only on aesthetics, and not including the lack of a high-end name, it would do just fine against much more expensive watches, in my opinion.  Certainly less so if the movement/mechanics and likelihood of many years of durability are factored in.  Compared with most inexpensive watches I think the appearance, coupled with whats been good time-keeping over the short time Ive had it, rank it well above most.

Please note that in the fourth photo I'm posting the color appears more golden than it should.

Probably to be expected at the price, this watch does not come in a fancy box, or even a watch box of any kind.  It came in an Amazon box, with the watch itself in an envelope of bubble wrap and an inner plastic sleeve.  Nothing fancy there.

The instruction card doesnt really provide instructions, including only maintenance, cleaning, cautions, battery indicator, an explanation of the water resistance rating(s), and the Operation Guarantee Certificate.

Everyone knows how to pull the setting knob on a watch to set the time, but unless Im missing something, and I don't think I am, the three mini in-face dials and the two extra buttons are purely decorative.  Ive got a more expensive watch with those same things so I knew how I expected them to operate, but I now see that the Amazon description doesnt even note the mini dials or extra buttons.  Because the instructions are so limited I cant be sure, but those things really do seem to be decorative only.  However, they do add quite a bit of visual interest and make it look like a much more expensive watch.

Also worth noting is that this watch does make a very soft tic-tic-tic sound, audible only in a very quiet room.

Bottom line:  I find this to be an attractive watch that appears to be well-made.  At the price I think its most likely it would be unreasonable to expect this to be anything like a legacy watch, but Im amazed to see how good looking inexpensive watches can be.  So given that, as well as the various caveats Ive noted, it would be easy to recommend this as an inexpensive watch to a friend.  Just don't consider it to be on par with watches costing multiples of the price!

I received this watch at a discount  not free (even given the low price)  but as you can see, Ive made note of all the negative as well as positive aspects I can think of.  I hope this review helps.
summary: Great look for the price, works well (although I can't imagine that at this price it will be a legacy watch).

I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I bought this wallet with intentions to use it for myself, and within a day my girlfriend had commandeered it and it's been her favorite wallet since day one. We have lots of other high quality leather products, mostly from Coach. That being said, this doesn't quite compare quality wise on that level (as the zipper pull separated and started to fray after a couple days) But it's definitely a nice wallet and so far has been up to the task

Pros:
- decent leather
- change pocket
- plenty of card slots
- love the zipper wallet style

Cons
- zipper pull leaves something to be desired

As someone with the bad habit of overstuffing my wallet with various things in addition to what does belong, such as cash and cards, this wallet is  a bit on the overly compact side for me, for I've had to leave behind some things in switching over from my previous.  However, I suspect with its interior flap that allows for storage of more cards than the wallet norm, roomy billfold pocket, and--in a rarity, particularly for men's wallets--change pocket, this wallet will get the practical job done for everyone.  Making this usable even for someone like me, however, is the great equalizer that is the zip-around to close it shut; it is a metal zipper, not a plastic one, so there's no fear of ripping and/or opening up accidentally, a fact further reinforced by the strong stitching.  As durable and rugged as this wallet is, such durability does not come at the sacrifice of style, for the leather is very high quality and of a unique and attractive color.
summary: Sturdy and stylish, durable and practical

I am a woman writing this review under my husbands account.  This dress is so fantastic!  I am 147 lbs, 36 DD and 5 ft 2 in.  The size large fit me perfectly with no pulling at the buttons on the bust.  I usually take a large in store bought dresses so this one is true to size.  It hits about an inch under my knees. Snap buttons are tight, not the cheap kind that un-pop all by themselves.  The sleeves roll up and are held in place with a snap button tab.  Soft rayon like fabric feels good on the skin- no stretchy polyester.  The skirt is full looking and gives a nice silhouette.  I would buy more in other colors if they were available.
