The price of this dress was excellent and definitely would say that it was well worth the purchase! It fit everywhere but was, a bit small/a bit snug , in the arm area. After trying it on a few times they gave a little bit but but think at this point it is up to me to slim down my arms to get the full benefit of the whole dress being comfortable. Not too bad though and really was a dress that I would wear to do chores in!  The fabric is nice and light and love the darker denim look! Nice length and has 2 breast pockets and rolled up arm buttons to attach to! The picture on the model does not give this dress justice. I love this style and can wear it up or down to suit your needs! I bought the largest size and feel it pretty much fit as expected ....but as I said the arms are a big snug but not too bad that cooler weather couldn't help, shaving a bit of weight in my arm area or even a water pill couldn't solve! That is the ONLY reason that this got 4 stars is the arms....but if you like it that shouldn't stop you from purchasing it because it is workable and can be worn for many occasions!  Deb ...Scott's wife

reviewText: Wow, I was fully preparing to have this be the wrong size, but it fits perfectly! I am 5'5", 114 lbs, bust 32C/34B, slim hips, and the size small fits like a dream. The waist indeed is nipped in, and I don't have a particularly tiny waist but it fits exactly (like maybe wouldn't be able to wear anything under it other than a thin tank, maybe). It does flare out a lot at the waist, so for a hipless/buttless person like me it's nice b/c i get that hourglass illusion. reviewText: This is a pretty nice zippered leather wallet!  I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this item, and my father is going to love it I'm sure!  My Dad is getting up in years, and it worries me that he is always carrying around so many bills, credit cards, insurance cards,etc.(a new wallet always spurs you on to clean out the old one)  He isn't always careful about how he gets money out of his wallet, and if you throw in a little anesthesia or numbing agents, he gets really bad!  I've had to take him to the pharmacy a couple of times after procedures, and he always wants to go in. He's just not safe in there like that.  This being a zip around is going to help a lot to keep everything inside.  There are plenty of slots for cards, and a nice ID window for his drivers license.  The quality of the leather seems very nice, and the stitching is all done very well.  I do like that there is a little coin holder in this too, so he can keep any small items in there or use it for change.  The zipper is a good strong one, and it doesn't catch or snag anywhere - it's action is nice and smooth.  I received this product at a reduced price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.  I am seriously thinking about getting one for myself!
summary: A really nice, sturdy and secure wallet for my Dad!

reviewText: I usually put quite a bit of stuff in my wallets and I do on occasion have the problem of cards or other items falling out if I open it holding it upside,down or dropping it. I have tried wallets with the nylon zippers but I have found those to be horrible because they come apart  and rip easily., . This wallet takes care of all those problems. First it holds a lot, and most importantly it has a very strong metal zipper. I tried testing its limits and if you ridiculously over stuff it, the zipper can be forced closed but the two sided will separate but with this zipper its easier than with most to bring the zipper back to reclose it properly. But, if you don't way over stuff it to the point where its hard to close this wallet will hold your cash and cards extremely securely and you will be extremely happy with it! The 24.99 that this wallet is listed at is a steal, the wallet that this one is replacing I purchased a few months ago and paid over 40.00 for it. That wallet is still in good shape, quality wise this one is at least equal if not better and this one has the strong metal zipper while my other one had none.  I did receive this wallet at a discount to try out then write a honest and unbiased review and I am quite sure you will be as happy with this wallet as I am.
summary: Amazingly Great Wallet At A Great Price!

Good looking watch winder. Didn't wind all types of watches. Cushion moves while winding.

Very quiet running so far.  We'll see in a couple months/years, how motor holds up, especially with larger/heavier watch.  It spins at an angle, which could cause stress overtime.  I put a 45mm watch in it, and it just clears glass/plastic (whatever it is).  Any bigger watch, and this may not work - there is no clarification about that in the product description.  Parts, and mode switch on the back feel very sturdy and well crafted.  The manual describes four modes to select for turning/resting.  You have to work the math if you wish to know the approximate turns per day (TPD).  They are probably a little on the high side per day, unless you go with 4th setting, where watch rests for 9 hours.  I need to make adjustments to my watch bracelet (make smaller), and I hope watch pillow still grabs enough surface area inside ring to stay put.  The material inside the case is described as velvet.  This does not appear to be any type of velvet I've ever seen - it looks and feels more than a faux leather, or vinyl.  It does it's job well enough.  The fit, finish, and English details in description and manual leave a little to be desired.  You get what you pay for, and again, this is not bad for the money.

Pleasantly surprised by this dress. I am 5'4" tall, 135 pounds, 34C bra and typically size 4 pants. I got a medium and it fit perfectly. The material feels like a pair of workout pants with a little sheen to it.

The colour is very beautiful. The cut is lovely and the length is perfect. I wish there was some sort of lining to hold it all in. I am by no means overweight - just average (I hit the gym 3-4 days a week). I am a size 3-4 and purchased the size Meduim. However the tummy area is not forgiving. It will show any minor bump you have on the tummy area and mine showed! I buy mostly tight fitting clothes and I never have this problem. For some reason with this dress I saw a minor 'bump' there and I have what people consider a flat tummy. I can imagine for anyone with who is not 'in shape' or who have any sort of a 'bump' there this dress would be very unflattering! I think I'm still keeping it because it's lovely otherwise and I think it's not that noticeable because the size 3-4 was not tight on me. Thank you!

reviewText:
after reading all the reviews from people who had received the shoes for free I thought what the hell I'll bite. What's the worse that will happen? I'd be out thirty dollars lol. Well the shoes arrived three days early and I'll be damned they are pretty sweet! Just arrived today so this is the first day of my son wearing them. So the quality is great, they look like they are made well. They look awesome just like the picture. They do look a lot like a very popular brand lol. So my 4 year old son normally wears a size 10.5 so I ordered a size 11. They just fit with no room to grow. I like the shoes so much I am going to order him a size 12 and he can wear the 11's the remainder of the summer. I would not recommend wearing these shoes in the rain or wet weather since the outer shell is like a knitted shell. After a month or so I will comment on how the stitching holds up. Hey they look cool and my boy loves them so that was worth the thirty dollars lol
Update: noticed the other 5 reviews are gone, also the shoes are no longer in stock soon after I left my review. Was looking to order the larger size. Anyone else think this is strange? I still like the shoes, hope they come back.
summary: Great kid shoes for dry weather!

reviewText: Fit yo small

These shoes exceeded my expectations! They look fantastic on my son and they feel much better quality than I was expecting.

Likes
+ look great
+ breathable
+ no tie laces
+ fit well
+ appear comfortable and soft (kids shoe so I couldn't try it)

Dislikes
- the plain white sole gives it away as a non-name-brand shoe

These shoes are so adorable! I got them for my son and I'm thinking about getting another color for my daughter. I love the texture at the toe and it appears breathable. The no-tie laces are great for young children. They hold tight without the hassle of keeping them tied. The back of the shoe was soft and comfortable and hit at a nice spot on the heel. As with most shoes that are not name brand, the sole of the shoe is what gives it away and makes it appear a little cheap. However, of others I've tried, this one is more molded and cushioned and seems really nice.

I love these shoes and they definitely appear a good value. We are saving them for the start of the school year, but I will update with wear if there is anything notable. I received this product for testing purposes. I was asked to be honest in my review - good or bad - to help future buyers. I am giving this product 5 stars because it is a beautiful suit!  the colors are exactly as pictured and it is wonderfully designed for the price!  however it was too large for me.  I ordered a size xxl based on sizing chart and reading reviews.  I should have ordered an XL.  I am 5 foot 5 , 148 pounds , i am athletic, weight is muscle based) and wear a size xsmall/small at old navy. I vary at other stores. maybe a size 5,7,9 in pants depending on the brand. I have a size 36 DD  bust.  I have never ordered from this company and needed a new suit asap so I ordered 2 different suits in 2 sizes. the other suit from this company in size xl fit perfectly. I would suggest not to order a size up as suggested but go down a size. the material is very stretchy and you want a bathing suit to be snug, because any suit expands in water!  this suit would have kept falling down if I wore it wet.  by the way this is my first bikini at 39 years old and am so excited the other one fit.. I had a c section 15 years ago and while I consider myself in shape, ive never had a toned tummy. this type of suit made me feel super feminine and sexy for the first time in a bathing suit. I always felt I was too young to wear a classic tankini, kind of like mom jeans lol.  but I was too self conscious to wear a typical cut bikini bottom.

There isn't much that I hate about summer but one thing that I do hate is there not being bathing suits that look cute and adult without showing everything that my 17-year-old has. The bikini is great for when we are at home but when we are at the lake I like her to look a little bit more conservative but still look feminine and look her age.

  DESIGN: This is the cutest design that I have ever seen in a bathing suit. My daughter was told repeatedly that she looked like a pin up model in it. The bathing suit is mostly a navy blue color with the chest portion of it being striped with navy blue and white. The bow that is located in the middle is a red and the straps that tie behind the neck are also red. I love that this bathing suit covers up but still looks as good as it does, The bottom portion of the bathing suit is built like a pair of shorts so there is no bottom showing. The bathing suit then covers it up some more because its built like a skirt. The top is cut very well as that most of the breast is covered. This is all great for those people out there that want to look cute without almost being naked at the pool.

  MATERIAL: The material that is used in this bathing suit is thick and of good quality. The material is really absorbent but also dries rather quickly when you are in the sun. At first inspection there were no tears or loose threading on the suit at all even after wearing this a couple times there are no stray threads.

  FIT: My daughter is a size 7 and I purchased this in a size 8 and the suit fit her perfect. There was no riding up on the back side and she never had to pull the front of the bathing suit up. If anyone has done this, you know what a pain it can be and those of you that don't I hope you never find out. The straps on the top did not dig into her neck, they are a little thicker so they are more comfortable and I know I like to be comfortable at the lake.

  BONUS: A beaded necklace comes with the bathing suit.

  OVERALL: This is a great bathing suit for anyone that is looking stay modest but still look cute at the lake or river. The way that the bathing suit fit means that its not going to show the world all your goodies. The look of this bathing suit is really retro and pin up modelish. The suit fit comfortable and was pretty true to size. The suit doesnt chafe or dig into the skin at all.

reviewText: I am a manager for a pediatric practice, and I love to wear jewelry and scarves with my outfits at work. My favorites are those that have hearts on them or that say LOVE. When I saw this bangle bracelet, I fell in love with it. I placed the order and this was shipped to me quickly. This is SO cute! The metal is good quality and heavy duty (not cheap feeling at all). This slides onto my wrist over my hand with no problem, and it is small enough to where it stays on without sliding off. The three bangles connected by the heart charm is a clever idea, as this sits really nice on my wrist and looks different than anything else that I have. I have sensitivity issues to a lot of different types of metals, and I have not had any problems with this bracelet. For the price, I think that this is so cute and I am happy that I found it. I received this product (very kindly) for free during a special promotion. I treat each product that I review as though I paid full price for it. There are many up-and-coming companies with new products that they want people to test and review so that they can have their name and product out there. I always give my honest review of a product (good or bad) in order to give those shopping on Amazon my best opinion of a product that they may want to check out. I too am an avid Amazon shopper and I value the opinions of those taking their time to write an honest review. My review is not influenced or manipulated and I am not paid to write this. I hope that I have answered some questions and that my review was helpful. Please feel free to send me any questions related to this product; I will try my best to answer them for you. My review, thoughts, and opinion are unbiased and 100% that of my own.

There are some stings for detail that are very loose on the bust so I am kinda concerned about those. This would be really cute for a night out but would be a little too informal for a formal occasion like a wedding. I would recommend for someone who wants a cocktail dress but is not a budget. reviewText:
What a lovely dress! It looks exactly like the photo and is very comfortable to wear. There's a light pink, silky material underneath the lace, which, on my skin color, blends in enough to hardly be noticeable. The skirt part flavors out on its own without a short petticoat under it because the material is a little stiffer, although it still flows well. There's a zipper up the back of the skirt, which I feel should have been black to blend in a little better, but it's easy to zip up yourself without help. There is a button at the back of the neck that is easy to do on your own as well, although unbuttoning it gave me a little bit of a problem, it wasn't all that bad. The dress is very pretty and I look forward to wearing it on date nights.

I did receive this at no cost to thoroughly test out and give my honest opinion. Your thoughts and experience with it may vary from that of my own, of course.
summary: It looks exactly like the photo and is very comfortable to wear

reviewText:
These tie bars are a great addition to any man's wardrobe. It's a great way to add in variety without having to spend too much money on 3 individual tie bars. The width is sufficient for more ties and they are a nice weight-- not flimsy metal. The springs are strong and they seem like they will hold up for awhile. I would give these as a gift to a young professional or a man who is looking to change up his wardrobe.

The tie bars come in three different colors, a bronzy gold, silver and grey black, all with a brushed finish. They have rounded edges so no chance of snagging anything on them.

I received these at a discount in exchange for my honest testing and review

When the need for a tie clip for my boyfriend came up, the TrendyLuz product caught my eye because it comes with 3 different tie clips in different colors.  While he needed the silver one, it's nice to have options whenever he needs to wear a tie again.  Make sure you know which tie width you'll be wearing it with, though, as these clips are not for skinny ties. For a more modern look, a tie clip should go anywhere from 1/2 to 3/4 of the way across the tie. For a class look, it can go all the way across the width of the tie, but NEVER extend past the end.  My boyfriend was very pleased with the tie clips.
I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

I have bought 5-6 tie bars for my husband but he keeps losing them. He wears a suit everyday for work and is active so it's safer for his tie to be clipped. He likes that three were in one transaction and that they were not ornate. I like that they came in silver, pewter and gold to match all the possible suit combinations. The last tie bar he had was gold and he would wear it with a dark grey suit, grey shirt and shades of grey and silver tie. Totally didn't match! I also like that the tie clips don't clip too tightly and wrinkle the tie.

I received this product for free or at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

reviewText:
I like this hat, it came in a small package but the bill wasn't bent which is great since I don't like my hats too shaped. The material is good, it fits patches if you have them. I am not military, however, I do like camo clothing items to go out hunting or fishing or just working in the yard. The hat has a Velcro adjustable fitting.
I received this product at a discount code from the seller.

Absolutely LOVE this hat!!! The digital Desert Camo color is spot on military grade requirements. Great hat well put together and stitched with a heavy duty wide Velcro adjustment  strip on rear of hat. Awesome digital print pattern, done right, goes perfect by itself or dressed. Show your RESPECT and PRIDE to yourself and your Country!!! Would be great gift for any loved one/s in or out of service. Fits as expected and NO EXTRA Wide rapper / skateboarder bill here, regular bill and fit. A couple of draw backs for me though, one I do not really care for the extra big Velcro tab on the rear of the hat and on top and the stitching on them ONLY. The plus side for me is the single stitch on these badge plates makes it easy to remove with no damage to the hat. The other down side was I did not care for the packaging of the product being in a plastic shipping bag and arriving smashed. I will say it did not affect the hat one bit and hat popped up with no creases. For those two reasons I was going to rate this only 4 stars but once I affixed the OLD GLORY patch on the front I feel in love again.  Show our pride today and every day!! I did receive this item at a free and or discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review. Shipping does take some time but it was clearly stated and did arrive within that time frame. Transaction was simple and hassle free.

I ordered this Attraco Tankini boy leg cut swim suit bottom on June 1st, and it was delivered on June 6th, so just a few days after I ordered it, and it was well packaged in a plastic bag.

These are simple black shorts, sized as a 32; I wear a 3X pant size and the waistline fits perfectly.  I bought them to match the Attraco Tankini top that I got a few days ago.  These shorts make that a perfect set because the black offsets the floral print of the top.

There are two things about these boy leg shorts that I would change if I could.  1) I would have the legs cut probably 2-3 inches longer down the leg, and 2) I would add two or three inches more material to the crotch area.  Thats because these shorts pucker up in the front crotch area.  When wearing them, it feels as if the shorts are riding up and bunching up in the middle of my legs.  I was worried that it was noticeable but my daughters said that you can tell the shorts are riding up in that area, but nothing personal can be seen.  If I could, I would suggest to the maker that the inseam have a few more inches of material to help get rid of that sensation.  (I checked out the way it was sewn, and the shorts are well sewn, all stitches straight and no hanging strings or frayed edges.  But I did notice the middle crotch piece is only a few inches wide, and thats probably not enough for bigger sized people.  Probably a couple of more inches there would alleviate the problem).

Note:  For the question "How does this product fit?  I answered Somewhat Small because of the length and the bunching problem.  But the waistline and short "body" iteself, it was a perfect fit for a size 3X person.

So, I will use these bottoms until I can locate another pair of black shorts that are a little longer and don't have that bunching up in the crotch problem.  Now, these may work much better for someone who is smaller, but for me its uncomfortable and I hope to find another pair that can match up with the great top I got.

Rigorous honesty is a personal policy of mine so as a buyer and a reviewer, it is important to me first as a buyer to choose products that I am interested in to help serve myself and my family in some positive way.  I also look to the reviews written about the products to help me determine if I want to try something new or something different so when I write a review, I strive to provide information and insight about the product that would interest me and help me make that yes or no decision to purchase it again.  All the opinions given, good or bad, are my own.  The product is only used by me or someone in my immediate family.  I received this product on a promotional discount (or for free) in exchange for my honest review and they are 100% my own opinions. I received no compensation for this review and I am not required to give a positive review. I am also not associated with the seller in any way.
summary: Great fit to the waistline, felt like they were bunching up in the inside seam

*** Received Discounted Bottle for Testing and Review ***

This is the first collapsible water bottle I've tried, and I love it.  There were no off odors or tastes to this bottle.  When I drink water from it, the water is all I taste.  I love that it's dishwasher safe (top rack only).  When I go to my exercise class, the bottle stands without worrying about tipping, even when empty.  That's because, as I drink the water from the bottle, there is a tiny air hole in the top that pressurizes the bottle so it doesn't collapse until I purposely squeeze the air out of it.

This bottle is completely water tight, so it's safe to toss in your backpack, even when filled with water.  Just make sure the top is screwed on tightly, the lid top is snapped securely to the bottle.  There is a latch to make sure the top stays securely closed.  Yet, if you're going to have access to potable water, you can squeeze the air out to collapse the bottle, and there is a strap to keep the bottle rolled up in a neat little bundle.

Ah, summer is here.  My favorite time of year.  I love going to the beach and the park and doing all sorts of out door activities.  The problem is that we need to make sure we are getting a lot more fluids to drink.  We usually throw a bunch of disposable water bottles in a bag or in the car and take with us but that is very wasteful.  We would like to use more reusable water bottles and make less waste.  One of the problems, however, is that when you finish the water you can't just deposit the bottle in a recycling container and go about your day.  You have to take it home with you.  When we are all out and about there are a lot of us and that means a lot of different water bottles to be carrying around.  That is heavy and inconvenient.

The great thing about the collapsible water bottle is that when you are done drinking you can roll lit up and it takes up a fraction of the space as a traditional water bottle.  This is so much easier to take with you and just tuck it into your bag.

Another advantage is that the silicone is very light weight. This means that in addition to taking up less space in your bag it is also much lighter which means less strain on your back as you are lugging these things about.

I will caution that this is really best for older kids or for adults.  There is a silicone "strap" that holds the water bottle rolled up and I feel that it would be pretty easy for a younger kid to break this.  That said, with a bit of supervision this should not really be a problem.

I also did not like the way that the water stayed in the spout. I found sometime that it would "spurt" when I opened the lid and would get me a bit wet.  This is something that you can prepare for and be careful when you are opening the bottle but something that you should nevertheless be aware of.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest reviews.  I know how important reviews are, especially if you are buying from a company that you are not as familiar with or are buying a product that you do not have much personal experience with.  The views of others that have tried out the product can definitely help you form your decision.  I therefore take giving reviews very seriously and strive for honesty and completeness.  I have had the opportunity to try out this collapsible water bottle and this review is my honest assessment of my views and experiences.
summary: Perfect for storing in your bag

reviewText: This water bottle is really cool. While I haven't seen too many collapsable water bottles, I think it is a really cool idea. This water bottle is a nice size, I think you would use this water bottle for things like traveling, hiking or any other adventure where you would like to keep your things confined. We ordered the black water bottle to keep it gender neutral since both my husband and I will be using the water bottle. As you finish the water bottle you can roll up the bottle towards the lid and secure the rolled up bottle on the lid. This really keeps the water bottle in a since compact formation while you aren't using it. If you are short on space, this is a great feature of the water bottle. The lid is nice as well with a cool design. There is a latch that secures over the button you press to open the water bottle. This ensures that the water bottle will not open when the button is pressed and the latch is in the locked mode. Additionally the mouth piece for how you drink the water is cool. The water does not flow freely so you will need to suck on it like you would a straw. I like this feature, but it is a little more work to get the water than a wide mouth water bottle. I would definitely recommend this water bottle to anyone who is looking for a functional/ cool water bottle for traveling or exploring. I am satisfied with the overall quality of the water bottle. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I am under no obligation to provide a good rating.

NOTE: The seller graciously gave me a sample of this product and asked me to write a review.

Although my hiking days are long gone, I still make the long hike from my desk to the water cooler at work more times a day than I should, so keeping a fairly large container of cold water handy definitely helps my productivity. I was intrigued by the description of the MyFriday Collapsible Water Bottle, so I agreed to review it at the seller's request. After trying it out, Im impressed by the size and versatility of the bottle, although the feel takes some getting used to.

When the bottle first arrived, I was surprised by the small size and weight of the envelope, and I wondered if Id been sent the correct item. I shouldnt have worried. The bottle is made out of a fairly thick rubbery substance that collapses easily (you roll it up like a tube of toothpaste). It has a small plastic strap that wraps around the collapsed container portion of the bottle to keep it rolled up, When collapsed, the bottle is only about 5 long and can easily be stored in a knapsack if storage space is at a premium. When the bottle is full, the plastic strap can also be used to hang the bottle on the strap of a backpack. When the bottle is unwrapped, it regains its normal shape easily.

The MyFriday bottle holds about 24 ounces of water, and the neck of the bottle is about two inches wide so you can easily fill the bottle with standard ice cubes from a refrigerator icemaker.  The bottle is about 8.5 long without the screw-on plastic cap and 10 long with the cap. It comes in four colors: black, blue, magenta, and orange. The bottle we received was blue. The bottle seems quite durable; obviously, the rubbery container portion of the bottle will withstand a fall from a table or onto rocky ground, and the plastic cap seems fairly sturdy as well.

The operation of the MyFriday bottle is fairly simple as well. It has a large white button on the front what, when pushed, releases the spring-loaded cap, Push the cap back into place and it snaps shut, with a little metal hook to ensure it stays shut. The push button operation isn't quite as smooth as I would have liked; you sometimes have to jiggle the cap and button a bit to make sure it snaps shut. The opening at the top of the bottle to drink from is quite large, measuring about 1 x 0.5, so you can drink a good bit of water at each swallow. Also, the bottle opening operates like a straw; you suck on it to get water. This means that you won't have any spills if you accidentally knock the bottle over on a desk or table.

Some people may find that the MyFriday bottle takes some time to get used to. Even when its filled with water, it gives way when you grip it, unlike traditional hard plastic or metal bottles. However, although it has s springy, rubbery feel, after washing the bottle in the dishwasher, it did not have any type of plastic or chemical taste whatsoever. The bottle is not insulated, but when filled with ice cubes and cold water, the contents stayed fairly cold for a couple of hours, although the outside of the bottle did sweat a bit.

Overall, the MyFriday bottle is a good bottle for outdoor or office use. It is sturdy, keeps water cool for a fair length of time, and has a larger capacity than many similar products. The operation of the pushbutton cap isn't as smooth as it should be, so it can be a bit tricky to make sure it stays shut, and the bottle definitely has a different feel to it. Still, the MyFriday bottle has found its way to my office desk where it stays in use every day.

My favorite water bottle!! I fill this up when I go somewhere and bring a sodastream filled with water so I can refill this bottle! There was a bit of a learning curve trying to drink out of a bottle that isn't solid but after a week, drinking out of a hard container feels weird. It has a little air intake valve (you can see it in the third picture, the white dot with four thin slits around it above the drinking spout) is the to help fill it back to regular size after you drink from it (it doesn't leak) and the spout that you drink out of is a suction system, meaning that you have to suck the water out and because of the little air intake valve, backwash is never a worry (great if you have a kid (or many) who like to drink your water while you're not looking or you're out and they are thirsty). Something also noteworthy, one of the times daughter was drinking out of it she didn't put it down properly and crashed to first to the laminate floor and it didn't get a scratch on it. No chips, no dents, no cracks, nothing! It hit pretty hard and it still looks and worked like new! The silicone rolls up very easily and holds securely (I did that then shook it vigorously and flying it forward and backward many times), though I never use that function of it because I just keep refilling it. For a couple of days I left water in it for most of the day to see if it would get a funny taste, when the water was warm (sitting in a warm car) it tasted a bit different but it was still drinkable if it was room temp or cooler it tasted like you just put it in there. I wish that the bottle held more water and came in a purple color (so I could get one for my daughter) but other than that it's a fantastic bottle!

Kimono style tassel cardigans like this are really fashionable this season. Ive seen more than a handful of people wearing these around, especially since I live near the beach. This thin almost sheer tassel cardigan makes a great beach-wear wrap or a cover up for your swimsuit. Its light and fashionable, and the material and tassels look great as wind blows through them. Made of rayon, the thin material is soft and smooth and is quite comfortable.

The design of this specific cardigan is an abstract white and black monochrome print and is quite neutral and beachy looking. The material seems to be quite wrinkly, and Im not sure if I like this feature. It makes the cover up look a bit messy looking, although that might be the effect the maker was aiming for. Im not sure about this. Although some may like this print, Im not sure it looks good on me. I feel the wrinkly material makes me look quite unkempt.

The tassels on the bottom are pretty neat, but I realized that they get tangled up pretty easily and become extremely frayed if you're not careful with it, especially after wash. I suggest using a laundry mesh bag (the ones you use to wash delicates) to wash this next time to avoid further fraying of the tassels.

In the end, I believe this would make a great beach cover up but not as a normal cardigan you wear out every day casually.  Ill probably wear this on my trips to the beach but am not sure if I will wear this often on normal days. This would be a great purchase for people who go to the beach a lot or want a fashionable wrap for pool parties, etc. I received this cover up cardigan for testing and evaluation and this is my honest and unbiased review upon thorough use.
summary: Makes a great beach-wear cover up but the material is very wrinkly.

reviewText: So cute to wear as a baithing suit cover up, or over a tank and shorts or jeans....

When I walked into my sister's yard wearing this kimono, she immediately stole it from me. I got it back but she wants one.. She is in the pictures wearing the hat, I am wearing the kimono in the others.

This is a loose, easy to throw on kimono that is great for the beach or pool. I don't think I would wear it with an outfit for street wear although it looks great on the model in the description. The kimono tends to be wrinkly which I think is the way it is supposed to be  That doesn't take away from its looks and versatility. It can be worn loosely sliding down one shoulder, thrown on like a little jacket, even belted. It super lightweight and won't be too hot even in the sun. Great for keeping the sun off in a stylish way.

The only small issue is the tassels fray and get tangled a bit. I am going to wash this either by hand or on the dedicates cycle and then hang it to dry to avoid ruining the tassels.

I got a size Medium. It was hard to choose considering it is not at all fitted. I went with the medium for length. I am 5'5', 124 pounds. My sister is 5'3", 130 pounds and it fit us both well. To be honest, I think she looks better in the kimono than I do. The couple of inches of length looks better. In all I love this kimono and have obviously worn it already to the pool. My sister is going to order one for herself if she can't pry mine from me. (She can't.) It's a nice alternative to run of the mill cover ups and so very lightweight and cool that it won't add warmth on a hot day when you just want to throw something over your suit but not wear anything heavy. Super cute and versatile.

I received this item in exchange for my honest evaluation. I am not affiliated with the seller and I was not compensated for my review. I had no idea if I would like this since it isn't really my style but I do and I think there are loads of ways to wear it. It's super lightweight and looks adorable. The tassels were why I took a star off. So far, so good but they have to be treated with care and caution.
summary: Great swimsuit cover up, Can be worn many ways.

This is a very comfortable 100% cotton lightweight hat. I love that it has a breathable insert in the hat; it will keep the hat and my head much cooler.  A plus is that the insert can be tightened if it is a little too loose.  I needed to tighten it just a little and now it fits great. It's 50+ UPF which is very important for me when I am in the sun.  It had a little smell to it in the beginning (that new smell of fabrics), but I just  put it in the dryer for a minute or two with a laundry sheet, and it smells great now.  It has a cute bow and tie around it to dress it up.  It also has a detachable drawstring to use to keep your hat on in the wind. It folds up easy for storage or travel.  I definitely recommend this hat for anyone who needs to protect their skin and face.  I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

When I ordered this bathing suit I also ordered a similar one from a different company, because they had it in another color I wanted that Angerella didn't have... and you can see the difference between the tops. I ordered the red top from Cherry Cat, and the blue one from Angerella. You can see how the wire has a space between it in the red top, but not in the blue top. I also noticed that the cups have a weird seam on it that is easily noticeable, and makes the top look cheap/ uneven. I might try ordering it again since I do love the color and the fit, however the underwire is so awful. Honestly I think I'm just going to order another one from Cherry Cat instead. My new best friend, I get compliments on it all the time. The only complaint is that there isn't a backlit feature for at night, so if I am outside in the dark the watch is useless if I need to see what time it is. I love the "james bond" features of it, how it alerts you to different things like text messages and accomplishments without being obvious. For a hybrid it should be a little thinner, I don't see the advance technology that would warrant it being so thick.

P.S.
I do worry about the strap breaking on me. I have tiny wrists so I have to pull the strap to the very first hole and that causes faster wear and tear. The straps are not "interchangeable" , so if the strap breaks I would have to take it to a jewelry or specialized watch shop.

I received this Origin Ties Men's Classic Striped Business Silk Tie at a discount for my review.

I was blown away when this arrived! Opening the awesome and unique looking tie box was exciting. I won't show pictures of the cool box because I myself an a sucker for cool surprises and I do not want to ruin it for you. Sure it's just presentation but we all love a nice opening right? Otherwise why do we worry about gift wrapping being pretty? Anyway the way it arrives in and of itself is cool but the tie, WOW just STUNNING!

My husband and I recently bought him 5 new ties costing anywhere from 35 and UP from there. I wish I had found these sooner! Granted there are limited color and pattern choices but the choices they do have are very nice and in fact I have three more of these in my "wish list" and will buy my hubby more of them here and there.

This grey color is sooooo gorgeous and my husband LOVES it - looks great with his favorite lavender business shirt as there is just the slight touch of lavender in this tie too.

There were no unwanted creases or wrinkles in the tie when opened.

100% silk and you sure can see and feel the quality!

This is a regular width tie - not super broad nor a skinny tie - just perfect and the width my husband prefers, actually he won't wear skinny ties and I have given several of them away because of that. This is a nice size for every day business wear, going out, parties, events, and anytime you want to dress to impress and this color I selected would go with many different colors of tops.

There is a slight texture to the tie as well which you can see in the images.

I think this is a great tie and color choice as well for wearing with a business casual shirt and some nice designer jeans for "casual day" at work which usually means you still have to look good.

I do like that it is stain resistant although I am not going to test this and yes it is dry clean only but its SILK so of course you do not want to just wash it.

The listing says it is designed in Italy which sounds really fancy and I do not know about all that but I can tell you it feels, looks, and is made JUST as well as the ones we spent way way more for and now I feel stupid for buying the expensive ones.

I have looked and Origin Ties has pages upon pages of listings of men's ties and I have been going through them saving a ton of them to my wish list for my hubby.

I DO update reviews if and when I run into future issues with an item and will do the same for this product but I have high hopes that it will last as long as the ties I pay way more for will.

I hope this review was helpful. Thanks for reading!
summary: 100% Silk Men's Tie Designed in Italy I LOVE this tie seriously was so thrilled when I opened it up and saw it.

The box comes with the 3 tie clips nicely displayed in a flip style box. Simply place the box in a gift bag and you are good to go. The finish on each of the tie clips is a brushed finish. Elegant but not too flashy. Wonderfully made.

I wore this outside today in 97 degree fahrenheit weather and it was so nice and breezy.

As the listing says it is flattering for all body types with enough draping and ruching to allow you to hide belly fat, and to accentuate the areas you do want to show off.

I just personally need more fitted items in my wardrobe as I have a lot of loose blousey tops and wanted to go with a medium on this one.
I love it - it is perfect for hot summer days and still look stylish!

I ordered 2 of these ties for my son to wear for his choir concert. I took them in the cardboard protective sleeves they came in.  Both ties came out of the sleeves with a horrible crease, each in the same part of the tie. There are wrinkle removal instructions in the order email I received but so far short of steaming them, the crease is still there.  He looked terrible on stage, the crease in his tie really stood out and I was embarrassed for him.  I wish I'd bought a tie locally, but unfortunately I didn't have time to go to the mall and thought these would be nice ties.
Great tie

** Update: Seller contacted me to let me know they have changed the packaging.  Assuming the new packaging removes the issue with the creases, this is absolutely a five star tie, so I have increased my rating from four to five stars. Original review below for details.**

This review is for the green tie.

This is a gorgeous tie.  I plan on keeping it, but I will not buy any more ties from this company.  Why?  The packaging leaves a firm crease that is a bit of a pain to remove.  Why would a company that primarily sells ties package a tie in such a stupid way as to leave a very firm crease where it will be visible when worn?!?

The tie arrives in a black envelope, approximately 15" long. When I first saw the package, I thought it looked rather nice.  Then I removed the tie and saw a very prominent crease.  I have a short torso, but when tied, the crease is below the knot and very visible.  It can be removed with an iron on silk setting and a soft cloth to cover the tie with.  But I would not order a tie knowing that I would have to spend time ironing it to make it wearable.  I have ordered a number of ties online, and this is the first time I have ever received one with any crease, yet alone one so prominent and in a spot that would be visible when worn.

Because of the way the tie is folded to fit in the envelope, there are actually two creases, one on the thicker front-facing part, and one on the thinner part that is hidden when the tie is worn.  The latter is not such a big deal, but the former is just absurd.

Other ties I have purchased online are folded about halfway, so that the crease will not be visible when tied, and then loosely folded so as not to cause additional creases.  That is how it should be done.

Again, that being said, this is an absolutely gorgeous tie.  The green is more of a turquoise/teal color, and it really pops in real life, but the pattern is subtle enough to keep the tie from being too loud.  It's very vibrant, but at the same time not too distracting.  I would highly recommend it if the company fixed their packaging, or if you do not care about having to iron out a crease on a newly purchased tie.

I think this case has some great and unique ideas, but the execution needs some work. It is all doable if the manufacturer fixes some simple issues. The outside of the case has a nice smooth look. I was confused about the inside, because it was kind of fuzzy, but I looked back at the description and realized that it is microfiber and meant to provide more protection to the case. Because you don't see or feel it once the case is actually on the phone, it's not a big deal, I just thought it was weird. If it really does protect the case more then it's okay to keep that part since like I said you don't see it once it's on the phone. The biggest issue is that when I was holding the case, the bottom part just came off -- I went back to the description again and saw that it is supposed to be a 2 piece case, so at least I know it didn't break, BUT I did try to lock it in tighter and there is no lock or click. It just slides together without locking together, so I would be really concerned that it's going to randomly fall off while on my phone between putting in my pocket, purse, or just while using it. It was a great idea to make  it easier to put the case on the phone, but these two pieces need to lock together tightly in order for it to really work. If this issue is fixed then this could be a great case. For now I'm just too afraid that what is supposed to protect my phone is going to fall apart.

The pictures for this beach wrap just do not do it justice. The bright pretty colors are what caught my eye when shopping on Amazon and I knew I had to this! I ordered the yellow / purple / orange wrap and I am definitely not disappointed with my purchase! I usually do not use cover ups or wraps when going to pool or beach, but I could not wait to wear this!

The wrap is pretty big so it is very versatile. You can wear it all different kinds of ways. I actually spent some time Googling different ways to wear it. I think you could even wear it out and not just to the pool.

It seems to be very well made, I have not have any problems with it yet and have used it several times already. Just be careful with it, because it is a fragile material. The stitching is done great, no fraying at all.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are my own.

I love the colors in this cover up scarf. It is so light weight and I like it a whole lot better on these really hot days. This is long enough that you can wear it doubles over around your waist , or single long from under you arms. This is machine washable , but the fabric is so light weight that it needs to be placed in a zippered laundry bag for your washer , or just hand wash.  The nice bright colors can go with just abut any bathing suit. I did receive this summer beach cover up at a slightly discounted price, to try it out and then provide an honest and unbiased review in regards to my experiences with the bathing suit cover up. reviewText: I wanted something light and simple that I could use at the pool to easily wrap around me and cover up. This one definitely fits that need! It came to mid-calf on me and I am 5' 3". It fit around my body easily and covered without feeling tight or small at all. Keep in mind this is very sheer and you CAN see through it. This is an awesome wrap and I am very happy with my purchase. I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Sheer, easy to use and lightweight.

reviewText:

Pros:
*EXTREMELY roomy
*One zippered & two slip pockets on the interior
*One large exterior zippered pocket
*Separate removable mini pouch included
*Adjustable straps

Cons:
*Advertised as two exterior zippered pockets, but it's one large pocket with two zippers (see photo)
*Wish the straps were attached to the back instead of the sides.

If I could, I'd give this 4 1/2 stars instead of 4.

reviewText: Did not come as described. Description stated 1x 78" and 1 x 90". The whole reason I purchased this is to get the 90" strap. Both straps came as 78"

I lost my luggage on a recent Europe trip. I had one of these straps on my luggage just in case my luggage got lost. I was able to describe my luggage with this distinct strap and they actually found my luggage! (In Portugal) I am SURE the bright fluorescent yellow straps with airplanes on them distinguished my luggage!

I've never been one to use these, and they're not exactly needed with a zipped up bag (older hard shell suitcases with latches could fail much easier), but they make finding bags a breeze.  They barely fit on the 28" Skyway bag (on longer dimension--there's plenty of room on the shorter one), but they secure nicely.  There's a small place for identification without messing with any tags that could snag.

I bought 2 of this luggage straps. Both of them claim to be "superior strength extra".

I was traveling abroad and I had 3 big baggages. My idea was put the baggages together with the straps and move them to the exit. See my pictures.

The color is so cute, the straps quality is nice, the way they can be attached is very practical. The packaging looks very girly. They even have a card for label it with your personal information.

However I paid $6.99 dollars for the larger one and $5.97 for the smaller one, but once they arrived the length was exactly the same. I did not contact the seller because used them as soon as they arrived.

Product provided on a discount price for the purpose of evaluation and review.

After the rotten experience of lost luggage on a recent trip I vowed to do everything in my power to make my bag easily identifiable. My bag has never been recovered and I imagine it is in a huge pile of generic black suitcases somewhere.  I bought the bright green straps and they are BRIGHT. The little airplanes are a silver reflective print. The straps are adjustable and easily fit the largest suitcase I own.  The buckles are sturdy and the straps actually have big snaps on them allowing you to fasten them together where they criss cross.  Combined with the huge name tags I have attached to my suitcases inside and out it will be hard to overlook my bag or mistake it for anyone else's.
These came as a set of 2 that could be used separately if you wanted. They arrived in a cute drawstring bag with a note from the company. Much nicer than the usual plastic bag.
I purchased this item at a reduced price in exchange for my honest review.

These were exactly what I was looking for. I have been looking for luggage straps for an upcoming trip where I know we will be checking multiple bags. I am always worried about someone taking our bags because they look just like all the other black rolling suitcases on the luggage carousel. These straps are so bright and noticeable! The pictures don't do them justice, they are fluorescent (I chose green for my husband and pink for me). The straps can be used together as shown in the pictures using the snaps to hold them together or you can use them separately. They extend to a pretty large size and should easily fit any regular suitcase (might be able to get them around width-wise on extremely big cases but probably won't fit length-wise). The straps are made of a sturdy material that doesn't feel cheap or flimsy. They buckles are plastic but strong. They do not lock like other straps I've seen. I didn't want locking straps as the TSA doesn't allow you to lock suitcases shut and they'll cut the lock off to check your bags. They also have a tag on them to add your personal information so there is no need for an additional luggage tag if you don't want one. All in all, I'm really happy with these luggage straps and think they will be very useful on our trip.

I did purchase this product at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. All opinions about this product are my own.

I opened the shipping envelope to find the product inside a cute little organza fabric bag (like a see through gift bag), which was an unexpected touch.

Quality seems good.  The bright color (I got the lime-yellow green) will help make it easy to quickly identify my luggage, while helping to protect the contents.  The two belts wrap the suitcase in two different directions, snapping to each other to secure in place.  A luggage tag is sewn into one of the straps.  I wish there was a way to lock the straps together so they couldn't be removed (such as with a TSA lock).  Overall, however, it should do its intended job well.

I did receive this product at a discounted price in exchange for this review; however, it reflects only my personal thoughts and experience with the product.
summary: Helps keep luggage secure and easily identifiable

reviewText:
This is an attractive, well-made shoulder bag that may also be used as a backpack.  The stitching on the bag, as well as on the strap, is even.  The strap is reinforced by a grosgrain canvas type backing that is perfectly dyed to match the bag. This backing is also evenly and sturdily stitched onto the strap. The strap also has padding at the point where it rests on one's shoulder, which is a nice touch.  The metal hardware appears to be sturdy.

The bag has a flip over front flap, and the interior of the bag has a polyester lining.  The interior zipper compartment has a zippered pocket suitable for small items,  as well as a zippered pouch that is perfect for one's smartphone accessories. There is also a pocket in which one may place one smartphone.  The bag also has two sections in the interior compartment.  The smaller section is suitable for one's Kindle. The main section can accommodate those items that one normally carries in one's bag.  There is also an exterior zippered compartment for those items for which one might want quick and easy access, such as one's keys.

 I selected the bag in the color red, and it is a beautiful, rich red . This bag, which I received from the seller in exchange for an impartial review, is made of PU leather, which is a faux leather made from polyurethane. The product details on Amazon advise that one should air out the bag in the fresh air for a few days, as the bag may smell a little. Well, that is certainly an understatement! The bag,  which is made in China,  has an almost toxic, overwhelming smell of some noxious chemical, rendering the bag unusable. I have been airing out the bag for almost a week now, and it still stinks to high heaven. The stench is so strong that it has lingered in my house for days, despite keeping the windows open. In fact, the stench causes my lips and tongue to tingle. This cannot be a good sign. Consequently, I cannot recommend this otherwise nice bag.
summary: A NICE BAG WITH AN OVERWHELMINGLY NOXIOUS, ALMOST TOXIC, SMELL...

reviewText: I didn't see myself wearing/using something like this until it showed up in the mail (quite quickly I must add).  The quality is GREAT.  The leather doesn't look cheap at all...it's quite heavy (not in a bad way); you can tell just by picking it up that it's made well.  The zippers are hard core ya'll..I have no worries of them snagging or ripping off.  When opening the largest area there are buttons on the side that snap apart to allow for MORE room.  That was a pleasant surprise!  The stitching is all very nice and the color is true to the advertised photo!  I'm decently impressed with this bag.  The straps are comfy and adjustable.  I have nothing negative to say about this product.  *I received this product at a discounted rate in return for my honest non-biased review and that's exactly what we have here!!  These are my very own thoughts, opinions, and observations.*  Happy shopping!

reviewText: When first receiving this bag I noticed the strong 'toxic' smell. It was a little off putting but I knew once I aired it out the smell would go. I was correct but a soft 'toxic' smell still remained months after making it. The overall appearance of the back was sleek and clean, exactly how it is pictured in the images shown. I first noticed that the zip was hard to fasten even without anything in the bag. Within a week of owning the back and using it to hold my wallet, keys, and sometimes a water bottle, the zip broke. The teeth of the zip would move or open, rendering the zip itself useless. I also start to notice the back would bend when using it over the shoulder. The back of the bag was too soft so the straps pulled on it making it bend regardless of wether heavy or light items were inside. The buttons that clasp on either side were extremely week too. They would constantly pop open, which let to the zip opening, and me walking around with a thrive target on my back. I really wished this bag would be of high quality since it is very pretty. MY advice: save you money and splurge a little on a better bag. Especially if you are going to use it everyday.

I absolutely LOVE this outfit! It is really great quality! The cotton fabric is thick. You can tell it is made really well. It also has a nice stretch to it, so it is definitely not stiff. It feels like very high quality fabric. Also, the tulle is great quality too. I have had issues with that thin tulle in the past. It tears very easily, and barely survives one use. That is not the case with this at all. It feels like it will hold up really well. I ordered the 12-18 month size, and I would say it is true to size. I put it on a baby that wears 12-month-old size clothing, and it seems like she still has plenty of room to grow in it. She is on the smaller end of the sizing range, which is why I believe it is true to size. Overall, I would highly recommend this outfit. It is just so adorable. It is not boring like most baby clothes. It looks like she is instantly dressed up, even though it is just a quick and simple onesie. I am extremely happy with this purchase. I do think it would be cute for a party, or even something as simple as a trip to the mall. It is just very versatile in my opinion. I also love the bold, gold queen letters on the front. Adds a bit of sass to the outfit. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

reviewText: not bad-needs more padding

Daughter (3 year old) loves it!  She's super into The Little Mermaid right now, so I thought she might like this; and she did!  It was a little too big for her, but nothing she won't grow into.  She went swimming in the pool with it, and was getting frustrated because the fins kept moving up and exposing her feet.  It's hard to explain to a 3 year old that the fins aren't real, and that they are going to ride up.  Maybe that won't happen as much as she grows into it.  The material was super flexible and looks very much like fins; it's sparkly and irridescent (sp?).  A little bit of the glitter does rub off, but not enough to change the appearance of the suit.  It held up nicely in the pool and didn't become heavy or stretch at all.  Great little costume that can be used for swimming.  It does come with regular bottoms so when the fins started to be too much to swim with, she simply took them off exposing the regular bathing suit bottom.

I ordered this for my daughter as her sister received a similar one and she also wanted to have a mermaid suit for the pool.  First off, do not go by the main product photo.  This is not a tail for a mono-fin.  The tail on this is completely open at the bottom.  I knew that prior to ordering, but others may not flip through the pictures.

My daughter is almost 5 and on the thin side, but tall for her age.  I ordered a size 2Y-3Y Small and its huge on her.  The bottoms are cut very odd, almost similar to adult bottoms with a thinner cut in the back.  They are very baggy around her legs and cannot be worn.  The top is also very large.  There is no support around so there is just baggy material around her.  The way that the top ties causes it to bunch in the middle essentially leaving her exposed.  The tail stays up around the waist, but drags on the floor.  After trying the suit on she was devastated when I told her she could only wear the tail.  I have another set from this brand and like it much, much better.  If you are only interested in the tail then this one will work fine.
I was given the opportunity to purchase this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText:
Even though my daughter really likes this bathing suit and the whole mermaid concept, as a mom I will tell you that the the sizing is completely off and the quality is mediocre... this set will not last long. I am attaching two photos to my review- one photo of the lovely - colored outfit being worn on the first day this purchase was received in the mail and the other photo of the already faded material only one week later (also take note that this has not been washed with detergent at all yet!!! only air dried after the pool a few times).

The color and shine on the material is clearly fading. More so the sizing is completely off... it seems like a one - size - fits - all kind of product. And I had intentionally bought a smaller size after reading some of the other reviews, thinking I would get it right. I got the 120CM (4-5 Years)- Size L for my average-sized 6 year old and it is still huge, loose, and baggy. There are several ways to wear and tie the bathing suit top, but no matter how we do it, it is not tight enough nor fitted well so it just constantly slides around... one of those one-size ill-fitting tops that would fit a grown woman also. I could go on and on about the sizing since I'm not sure why there even was a sizing option it the first place with such a bad fit. If I was buying a one-size fits all set my expectations would have been different and maybe the rating slightly higher.

I did get this item at a discount price to ensure quality testing and leaving an honest review. Not all my ratings are the same, nor am I affiliated with this company in any other way and I strive to review truthfully based on my own opinions and experiences. So, I do hope my review is also beneficial to you in your own purchasing decisions.
summary: Daughter likes mermaid concept, but sizing and quality are not good

I believe the girl in the first photo is wearing something different and has monofins inside of it which gives it the different shape, and monofins are not included in this.

Update:  These only lasted once in the pool. Its very much like a costume, and even then still doesn't look like a mermaid.  She was happy to get it, shes six and wore it in the pool and it greatly faded after one swim.  It is now very disheveled looking and she doesn't want to wear it.  I have some concern over what chemicals were used in this because of how itchy it was and how it dissipated with the swim so quickly. The top was barely wearable, nothing like the photo. reviewText: My 8-year-old daughter picked this swimsuit out online, from a literal sea of girl's suits available on Amazon. She was specifically looking for a top to go with her existing mermaid swimtail. She loves it, and the top does indeed match her existing tail, so she's as happy as can be. However, I did need to make several modifications to it. We cut the bow off of the back of the bottoms and sewed the two triangle pieces together on the top so they didn't slide apart while she was swimming. The cut of the suit is not particularly flattering but she doesn't notice! The size chart was somewhat confusing because not all relevant measurements were listed but we went with the Large and it fits okay. She is slender and the bottoms are still a bit loose. The fabric has a subtle scale print, which is pretty. The top has a thin padding overall; some of the other reviews mentioned snipping it out but you would have to take apart a seam and sew it back together to remove it so we just left it in. It's not what I would consider womanly shaping, just a thin layer of padding to the entire triangle piece. Overall, my daughter loves it, I was luke-warm about it, the price was reasonable.
summary: pretty fabric, fit and some details not quite right

I'm a mom to two girls ages 3.5 and 5.5 and they are both obsessed in mermaids. And I mean anything mermaids. We have more mermaid dolls than I can count, mermaid clothes, bags, costumes, you name it.  I was able to purchase one of these mermaid bathing suits for my older daughter about 1.5 years ago but at the time I couldn't find one small enough for my younger daughter. Fast forward 1.5 years and my younger daughter is now big enough for one so of course she wanted nothing more than to match her big sister which led me to purchasing the PGXT Girl's Kids Princess Mermaid Tail Sea-maid Bikini Swimwear Bathing Suit.

I'll admit I was a bit hesitant when I read the reviews about whether this suit was going to work for us but the price was right so it was a risk I was willing to take. Well, I'm so glad I did. The suit arrived very quick. The blue color is very pretty and vibrant. My daughter absolutely fell in love with it immediately and couldn't wait to try it on. She honestly looks so adorable in it.

You'll notice in my pictures there were a few lose strings but nothing that I could easily trim with a scissors. The lose strings had no effect on the actual bathing suit. The quality of the bathing suit seems to be decent and is very much in line with what I was expecting. My daughter is very slender so she has trouble with two piece bathing suits fitting her right in the first place but this really fit her okay. I ordered the smallest size which seems to be in line with a 2-3. The top is adjustable and the bottoms were just a little lose on the sides. The mermaid tale fit perfectly and she was able to easily walk around in it.

I think this is a great suit for dress up or the pool. I really don't think there's too many little girls out there that wouldn't love it. I mean who doesn't want to be a mermaid!
summary: Who Doesn't Want to be a Mermaid!

reviewText:
I like it but way too small.
The XXL is equivalent to a ladies' medium.

I bought this to give to my 6-year-old for her birthday, as she was having a mermaid theme party. It was such a hit! I had been looking into getting her one with a green tail, but I didn't like how it looked at the bottom. This one flows sounds her ankles, giving the allusion of the mermaid tail. So fun! I remember going through a mermaid phase when I was her age, and I would have loved to have an Arial tail. It's fun to live vicariously through my kids. ;) I just wish it had swim bottoms included.

She loves wearing it as dress up, so is great that it has the openings at the bottom for her feet to come out. There is plenty of room for her legs to move around in it, and since it's made of swim suit material, it's very stretchy. She's super skinny, so the top was kind of big on her, but I expected as much with her size. But I mostly got it for the tail anyway, which I wanted to be long enough to cover her feet, so that's fine. When she wears it, I just put a safety pin in to tighten it up a bit, and it works great. I'm not sure how you'd actually wear the tail as a swimsuit, since it is just a long skirt that had been cut to look like a tail at the end. It's not tight around the ankles, so you can see right up it, and when you're swimming, it flows up, so you have to wear a swim bottom under it. I kind of wish I had bought one with the 3 pieces, including shorts, but I wasn't really thinking, and didn't realize this would be an issue until she tried it on.

The other little girls at her birthday party were seriously so jealous. The colors are so pretty together, and it's just every girl's dream to be a mermaid!

Disclaimer: I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

reviewText:
The material is bright and of good thickness for swimming suit. I like the fact the tail is not sewn shut , but left open at the bottom to allow the child to walk without falling. Also while swimming if she needs her feet out she can get them out with ease.
The bottoms are seen well , no gaps no strings hanging . They are so cute with the added bow on the backside of the swim bottoms as well. Now let's talk about the top, it is not horrible but I feel there could have been a little more thought in the design and fit of the top. It is two flat triangles with two strings attached at the top of the triangles to tie around the neck. Then there are tow more strings attached to the outside corners of thes triangles to tie them around the chest . And the two triangles are connected with a tie about two to three inches between the triangles to keep it all together. For my granddaughter who is 10 the largest size fit her perfect but she's a little developed and the triangles being so flat it causes some showing of more of her chest area then preferred.
I believe this particular style of mermaid tail and swimming suit is made for children under nine and not near tween time.

reviewText:
This Versatile Bag was just what I was looking for when I travel or go to the gym. I like the optional feature of carrying it like a bag or wearing it on my shoulders like a backpack. It is well made of good quality material; I expect to get many years of use out of it.
I received this Sport Duffel Bag at a reduced price for my honest and unbiased opinion

This is a nice versatile bag.  I have used it as duffel that I throw in the back of my CRV.  It can be used as a backpack but I have not tried it.  I carried it in the rain and it is waterproof and it is light to carry (depending what you pack of course) It has plenty of room and well placed pockets.  I use mine for going to the fitness center  but it could easily be used as a carry-on if you are flying someplace because it could be stored under your seat as well as in an overhead compartment.  It is well made and I expect it to last.  I have tried other gym type bags and usually, the zippers are flimsy or the bags are kind of clunky.  Not true in this case at all.
I received this bag at a discount in exchange for my honest review.  So, if this bag ends up not being as durable as I believe it is  I will update my review to reflect it.

reviewText: To small. Have to ship back.

After reading the reviews, I have to agree on the following:
1. It runs large. I am an hourglass figure, and it fit fabulous on top and through the arms, but it gradually gets larger as it goes down. I noticed the pear shaped woman rating it better than me. It probably suited her shape a little better. I usually look for a cut that goes in at the waist. This was huge around the waist and the butt (and I have a large bubble butt). It added an unnecessary bulk, especially at my lower back. I am going to try for a smaller size, but had to pay return shipping for that.
2. It is very soft. This is not your typical wool pea coat. I can see why some women are saying it's cheap. I don't think it's cheap. I think it's just a softer not as structured type of material. I was actually going for comfort, so the material suits me well. It gives the look of structure with the feel of soft and thick almost sweatshirt comfort. I think it'll be great for a mild to moderate winter. Not sure how it will hold up on super cold days.
3. Long-armed women: this coat will be fine on you, but it's not going to be fabulous. Typically coats are short on me exposing my wrists far more than I want. This does the same when my arms are bent, but not when they are straight. I will make do as I think I am the exception and that's the life I have to live. But again, it's not the worst I've seen.
4. The price is fabulous. For what you are getting, you cannot beat the price. It's generous and longer than you'd think on. It will keep you warm. I think it's worth it. Thus the effort to get a smaller size.
summary: I noticed the pear shaped woman rating it better than me
